movie101_6965768652251628068_1140_1320.text: Xia Luo, who was about to step forward to kiss Ma Dongmei, was suddenly pushed aside by Ma Dongmei. Xia Luo, startled, quickly pulled back and said, "Mom, I'll burn some extra paper for you later."
Xia Luo, who was hanging outside the window, fell into the building.
Ma Dongmei looked at Xia Luo with a hint of surprise, then continued to play with her ice cream. The next day, the two of them were in a room with a chandelier.
Xia Luo lying on the bed, opened his eyes and said: "Wife, I dreamt of my mom."
Xia Luo's Dad: "Son, who are you calling your wife?"
Xia Luo: "Mom"
Mom: 'You scared your Mom to death, can't believe you are still alive, can you?'

Mom: "Maybe you should consider transferring hospitals."

Xia Luo, wearing a neck brace, struggles to walk out of the hospital. He meets a group of kids on the road, and they all stare at him.

The scene shifts to the streets of Beijing, where people are bustling about, and the voice of Ma Dongmei can be heard: "This is the heart of Beijing," "the most free and unrestrained area in the city."

Mom says: "If something happens to Xia Luo" "I just can't go on living" "Honestly" "Xia Luo has been fatherless since he was little" "Right after Xia Luo was born" "Xia Luo's father disappeared"

The scene shifts to the school, where Ma Dongmei is walking home from school, with Xia Luo following behind with a book in hand.

movie101_6965768652251628068_1320_1500.text: The next day, the school broadcast announced the suspension of Da Chun, Da Chun was furious, and the three of them hid in the corner, laughing. Zhang Yang said: "Xia Luo is pretty badass, daring to hit a teacher."

Ma Dongmei: "Hey, you shorty smoking next to the toilet, which class are you in? Get to the principal's office now."
The next day, Da Chun and his two best friends are sitting on a bench. Da Chun says to Qiu Ya: 'Qiu Ya, cheer up. It's just a kiss.'
Ma Dongmei walked over and said: 'Listen up.' 'If you have something to say, say it to my face.' 'Stop gossiping behind my back all day.'

Yesterday, there was a shocking incident where a student hit a teacher in the second class of the third grade. The culprit, Xia Luo, committed a grave offense and should be expelled. However, he recognized his mistake in time and repented by jumping from a window."

movie101_6965768652251628068_2040_2220.text: The scene shifts to the living room, where Da Chun is holding a watermelon, watching TV. The TV is on mute, and Da Chun is also watching the news. movie101_6965768652251628068_2220_2400.text: The next day, the school held a flag-raising ceremony, and the students sang the national anthem in unison. Xia Luo, with a guitar strapped on, stood on the stage and played the instrument while singing.

Qianqian will end up with you sooner or later. The gang will be yours eventually, but unfortunately, you acted too hastily with this setup."
Fang Jie lowered his head and said, 'Father, I'm too foolish to handle such a big setup.'

Tang Hexuan said, 'The fortune teller said I have a hard destiny, which means 'One general's success is built upon countless bones.' But I still need someone to take over. I held you in my hands to raise you, but you don't want that; instead, you choose to be one of the bones under my feet.'
Tang Hexuan said, 'You want to see the bones with your own eyes.'
Tang Hexuan said, 'In this world, the most terrifying people are those who pretend to be fools. Even scarier than pretenders are actual fools.'

Tang Hexuan said, 'The number of people eating with me is getting fewer and fewer. In the end, family is the most reliable. Let's eat. Doing too many good deeds displeases the bad. What's the use of being a good person? Kind people are taken advantage of. This is society now.'

movie101_7021874945990853151_660_840.text: The scene shifts to the interior of the building, where the wooden frame is exposed, with numerous steel bars protruding in all directions.

The crowd was singing: "It's like a warbler's call, softly waking the spring dawn. It's a love song and dance, intoxicating the beautiful night."

Ye Qishan was stunned, his eyes wide open in disbelief. He stared at Tang Hexuan, who was looking at him with a triumphant smile. Tang Hexuan sat back in his seat, and the underlings stood by, all waiting for Ye Qishan's reaction.

Tang Hexuan said, 'If you don't mind my saying so, there's still some love left, don't waste your time.'

Tang Hexuan said: "Thank you, Mr. Ye Qishan, for the kind words." "But think about it, even if Xiang Yu were given a thousand chances, he still wouldn't beat Liu Bang." "That's the difference between a hero and a tyrant." "For so many years in Shanghai, many heroes have wanted my life, but in the end, they all died."

Tang Hexuan was drinking red wine, and suddenly a figure flashed outside the window. He frowned and looked outside, but the person was already gone. movie101_7101937153785102885_4560_4740.text: The scene shifts to a small alley, where the ground is wet and there are a few cardboard boxes piled up in the corner.

Yuan Xiaoou: "Qi Jia, I don't like saying goodbye face to face. Let's say goodbye in this way. First and foremost, you must take your medicine on time, two bowls with half a pot of water, drink it after breakfast and dinner, the one at night doesn't need to be reheated, just warm it in hot water. Don't panic when you forget your keys, I've hidden a spare one in the electricity meter box at the door, you'll touch it as you reach out. You can't give up on exercise halfway, you must add ten sit-ups every week, and running must be an hour after dinner. When running, don't think about anything, just run."
Qi Jia walked into the kitchen, saw the knives on the table, and then opened the drawer, only to find that the knives were no longer there.

Yuan Xiaoou, holding a cactus, walked to the window, and just as he was about to throw away the pot, he saw Qi Jia passing by.

Qi Jia was startled by the cactus's reaction, and she slowly moved her finger away from the cactus. She watched the cactus for a long time, and the cactus also slowly calmed down, with its spines gradually retracting.

If you really had no ulterior motives, you would not have copied that USB flash drive and taken it away; you would have destroyed it right then and there."

movie101_7166164445343941151_3960_4140.text: Xu Decai, with tears in his eyes, tried to control his emotions and said, "Stop talking, I understand everything."

Yang Shan said: "Then you can go, I'll eat by myself"
Driver said: "Okay, okay, we'll eat, we'll eat"

Yang Shan was preparing a bowl of sweet and sour fish. She was so focused on the deliciousness that she didn't notice the sunlight shining on her face. She turned her head and saw the shadow of Driver on the wall.
Driver was about to go upstairs to find Yang Shan, but saw Xu Decai coming in through the door. He quickly hid the box behind him and ran upstairs.
Xu Decai asked, "Driver, what happened? Who came?"
Driver pointed at the door and said, "Nothing, my apprentice is here. I asked him to help me move. That lazy bum just now came."
Driver said, "Don't talk about him like that. You guys sit down first. The food will be ready soon."
Driver said, "Alright, nothing's wrong," and then Xu Decai left, leaving Driver alone to start packing up Yang Shan's clothes.
Xu Decai, who was about to speak, was grabbed by the collar by Driver. Driver said: "What do you have to say to your daughter?" "Say it now, today," "Only one of you is getting out alive."
Driver, struggling, said, 'You ruined my life, do you know that?'
Driver, with tears in his eyes, said, 'Who ruined Yang Shan's life then?' 'If it wasn't for you and Zhao Bing being together ten years ago' 'Could she be like this now?'

Xu Decai said, 'I had no other choice, you know that' 'If you hadn't brought Yang Shan to find me,' 'Would she have found out?' 'Would she have turned out like this?' 'Everything I did' 'Was for a better life with Yang Shan'
Driver angrily said, "Don't talk crap, you ruined Yang Shan and you say it was for her."
Driver, while being beaten, said: 'I did it for her' 'You don't understand how much I love her' 'You don't understand'
Driver, pointing at Yang Shan, said, "How dare you say that, you love her? You only love yourself. If you loved her, would she be like this? Would she be like this?"

Driver, with tears in his eyes, said, 'Do you know why she had to find you ten years ago?' 'Because she was pregnant with your child' 'She wanted to tell you first thing' 'The child was lost later' 'Cried her eyes blind' 'This is the result of your love, right?' 'Right?'
Driver shouted: 'You're lying'
Yang Shan walked in and said: "Driver, Driver what are you guys doing? Hurry up and come eat with your apprentice."

Driver, who was about to be taken to the police station, was choked by Xu Decai. Driver's face turned red, he was about to faint, and his hands were weakly placed on Xu Decai's arms. Xu Decai said: "Okay, we'll go in right away"
Yang Shan said: "Hurry up"
Driver said, 'When we're inside, keep your mouth shut'
Xu Decai looked at the man in front of him, then turned his gaze to Yang Shan. Yang Shan handed him a drink, saying: "Here, Xiao Bing"

movie101_7166164445343941151_4500_4680.text: Yang Shan smiled and handed the wine to Xu Decai, but Xu Decai didn't take it.
Driver raised his glass and said, 'Little Soldier, I owe you a lot over the years. Take care of your wife and kids, and look after me, too. This cup is to honor you.'
Yang Shan said: "This is the rose wine I brewed myself. It's non-alcoholic and doesn't contain any alcohol."
Driver said, 'I didn't do anything.' Driver looked at Xu Decai, who was frowning and staring at him.
Yang Shan smiled and said: "Come on, the apprentice of Little Soldier."
Driver quickly stopped him, saying: "He is not of age yet and doesn't drink alcohol."
Yang Shan said, 'Little Soldier, how have you become so harsh? The young brother has been here for a while and hasn't spoken; is the food not to your liking? Come on, don't just sit there.'
Yang Shan said, "He doesn't speak, he just eats, already finishing half a bowl of rice."
Yang Shan looked at Driver and said: "Little Soldier, we won't be moving too far away from here."
Driver lowered his head and said: "Not far from here."
Yang Shan smiled and said: "That's good." Driver glanced at Yang Shan, then looked down and continued eating.
Xu Decai said: "You know, Yang Shan, I think you should have left this place a long time ago. I know in your heart you can't let go of that bastard, and you don't want to see him. Why bother?"

Yang Shan said: "No, it's not that. It's this shop I can't let go of. In another year, it will be ten years since the shop opened. I had plans for celebrating the tenth anniversary: to invite all the customers who have bought flowers here, and thank them for all these years."
Driver looked at Xu Decai, who avoided eye contact. Yang Shan said: "Right, when moving, remember to take my dancing shoes. They were a gift from Xu Decai."

Xu Decai looked at the photo, then at the ballet shoes on the shelf, and finally at his daughter's photo. He closed his eyes in sorrow, and the corners of his mouth that had been slightly raised now drooped. He slowly shook his head, and the wrinkles on his forehead deepened a bit.
Driver said: 'You really care about the stuff given by the ungrateful one.'
Yang Shan said: "It's already like this now. I've gotten used to it over the years. As long as I can feel his breath, that's good enough for me."
Xu Decai, with tears in his eyes, looked up at Driver, then lowered his head to continue eating. He wolfed down a few more bites, then stopped.
Yang Shan looked at Driver with a smile, and the goldfish in the bowl were also swimming happily.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4680_4860.text: The scene shifts to the dining table, where the family of three is sitting together.
The scene shifts to the next day, the three of them are sitting around the table eating hot pot, Man and De Cai are silently eating, while Yang Shan is fanning the table.
Man said: "We’re eating, we have to relocate, let's hurry up and move, ah, hey, you, aren't you..."
De Cai asked: "How do you know me?"
Man looked at De Cai and said, "I've seen you on the display board at the group."
De Cai asked, "What's going on?"

Man said: "This was the ""Urban Hunter Project" you planned two years ago" "Starting today, the demolition begins" "The place where you’re standing now" "Will be our city's landmark building in the future" "This whole area will be our most bustling office building complex"
De Cai looked at the two people who had just been through a tough fight, feeling a bit at a loss.
The scene shifts to the street, where workers are moving items with wheelbarrows, and a large truck drives slowly, stopping by the roadside.
Driver, holding a stick, said: "Yang Shan, Yang Shan, Yang Shan, Yang Shan is gone, she was just here."
Driver said: "Yang Shan, Yang Shan what are you doing, be careful!"
Yang Shan said: "Xiao Bing, did you hear the music?"
Yang Shan said: "What? No, I didn’t hear anything."
Yang Shan looked around and said: "I seem to hear it, it seems to be coming from over there."
Yang Shan said: "I hear it, I hear it". Yang Shan was calling out to the birds in the courtyard, but the birds in the courtyard were not as responsive as the ones in the city.
Yang Shan, dressed in a long dress, stood on the balcony looking at the flowers.

Yang Shan, dressed in a floral dress, with a garland in her hair, is dancing in the courtyard. She twists her waist, sways her arms, and smiles at the sun. The garland in her hair is swaying with her movements, and the flowers on her dress are also fluttering in the wind.

Yang Shan danced gracefully, her movements light and airy, her body soft as a cloud, her arms tender and boneless, her legs supple as willow branches, every step blossoming like a lotus, every movement spreading joy like a smiling sun.
Yang Shan was dancing on the rooftop, while the workers were all looking at the luxury car.
The car flew out of the window, flew past the people below, and then crashed into the second-floor window of a house in the alley.

The scene shifts to Yang Shan, who is playing with the plants in the flower bed. She is wearing a dress, and there is a beautiful flower on her hair. She looks very gentle and is full of smiles. De Cai is standing opposite her, wearing a shirt and with a serious expression.
Yang Shan danced gracefully, moving effortlessly through the greenhouse. She was full of youth and vitality, her body soft as a cloud, and her every move exuded beauty.

movie101_7166164445343941151_4860_5040.text: Yang Shan was dancing on the rooftop, surrounded by green plants. She moved gracefully, dancing freely in the sun. Below, the workers looked up at Yang Shan, their eyes filled with admiration.

Yang Shan was wearing a long dress, her smile as bright as clear skies. She was dancing on the terrace, her dress billowing with her movements. It seemed as though she had shed her inhibitions, her body moving freely in the sun-drenched space.

Yang Shan was wearing a floral dress, her hair was full of flowers, and she was surrounded by plants. She looked at the workers below and smiled. The workers were wearing helmets and waving at her. Xu Decai was also among them, saluting at her.
Xu Decai looked at the two people in the distance, then turned to the bodyguards and said, 'Turn off the music.'

The scene shifts to the car, where Xu Decai is listening to music. At this moment, Yang Shan and her husband are packing up their things, preparing to leave. Yang Shan turns around and says: "Xu Decai, are we not talking?"
Xu Decai, who was about to go to the construction site, was stopped by a worker. He turned his head and signaled his subordinates to let him pass.
Yang Shan, who had been waiting at the door for a long time, saw Xu Decai and breathed a sigh of relief. She smiled and said to Xu Decai, 'Let's move.'
Xu Decai walked to the side of the truck, looked at the workers, and then turned to look at the building.
Xu Decai was walking on the street, looking around. He looked up and saw a huge billboard with his own photo on it.

Xu Decai looked at Yang Shan with a face full of tenderness, but Yang Shan's expression was somewhat cold. Xu Decai's eyes were filled with affection, but Yang Shan's gaze was distant, as if she was thinking of something.

The scene shifts to a street where a row of houses is being demolished. The large machine rips apart the walls, leaving only the door frames and a few wooden beams. The walls are torn apart, and the roof collapses to the ground.

The scene shifts to a dilapidated staircase, where the paint on the wall is peeling off, and the railings are rusty. A small flower, made of plastic, is inserted into the corner of the staircase, swaying slightly.

The next morning, Xu Decai was getting ready to go to the market. He walked out of the house and saw a flower pinned to the door. The flower was as if it had been plucked from a tree, with a stem and all. It was pinned firmly to the door with a clothespin.
Yang Shan asked: 'Where did you go just now, why did it take so long?'
The driver said: 'I had some things to do, let's go.' The driver started the car.
The driver asked, 'Where to?' The driver's phone rang, and he answered it.

movie101_7166164445343941151_5040_5220.text: Xu Decai sent a WeChat message to Song Second Brother, saying, 'When you hear this WeChat message, we are already far apart. I lost, I lost everything, including you. I'm sorry.'
Xu Decai looks up and says, 'What's up?'
Xu Decai says, 'Little Soldier ah,' 'Send me away,' 'Take me to the place where I got on the car.'
Little Soldier says, 'Brother, why do you need to do this, the person is already gone, what’s the use in going back to find her now?'
Xu Decai said, 'Send me to the place where I got on the car, just pretend you haven’t seen me these past few days, remember it.' Little Soldier nodded in agreement.
The van slowly started moving, and the pedestrians on the sidewalk quickly cleared away. The van slowly drove onto the road, and the surrounding cars immediately made way for it.
The scene shifts to the highway, where Xu Decai is driving a truck, closely followed by Little Soldier.
Xu Decai looks at him, his eyes revealing a hint of helplessness.
The car is moving fast, through the window you can see the rapidly retreating scenery, the car is moving from the suburbs into the city.
The man in the truck looks at him with a puzzled expression.
Xu Decai got out of the car, closed the door, and walked to the other side, looking at the front of the car.
The woman in the truck is staring at him, but he doesn't notice. He looks down at the road ahead, his brow furrowed, lips pursed, and slowly closes his eyes.
Xu Decai, who was in the back, took out a cigarette and put it in his mouth. He looked at the road ahead, took a deep breath, and then exhaled the smoke in his hand.

movie101_7166164445343941151_5220_5400.text: Xu Decai, with a cigarette in his mouth, stood in front of the wall, took a deep drag, and then slowly exhaled the smoke, which dissipated in the air. The cigarette butt was left on the edge of the wall, with only a flickering ember at the tip, glowing orange-red.
The scene shifts to the roadside, where a girl is squatting, washing vegetables. A pickup truck drives up, stops next to her, and the girl looks up at the vehicle.

Wang Xiaobing, who was eating, stood up and walked to the roadside to wipe his sweat. He took off his T-shirt and wiped his body with it. A little girl nearby was watching him, and Wang Xiaobing waved at her to invite her inside. The girl nodded and ran into the restaurant. Wang Xiaobing took a deep breath and went inside to look around.
Wang Xiaobing looked at the woman in front of him, who had her eyes wide open and was staring at him. He blinked and slowly turned his head to look at Lady Boss, saying: "Cui Hua, Dog-shit"
Wang Xiaobing looked at the ceiling, then at the window, and then at the ceiling again. He blinked and turned his head to the side, slowly getting up.

Wang Xiaobing looked up at Cui Hua, then turned his gaze to the floor. Cui Hua propped her hand on her chin, quietly watching him. Wang Xiaobing glanced at her, then lowered his head, pursed his lips, and took a deep breath.
The scene shifts to the dining car, where Big Brother asks: "Who owns the car at the door?"
Wang Xiaobing looked up at Lady Boss, who was holding a kitchen knife and said, "Playing time travel with me?"
Wang Xiaobing stood up and said, "Fuck your ancestors."
Big Brother walked in and said: "Stop it, bro, put down the chair for now. I've been looking for you for several days, last time we hit the wrong person."
Wang Xiaobing pointed at the distance and asked, "Where's my box?"
Big Brother said: "I don't want money."
Wang Xiaobing said: "Big Brother, I took the box. It's in the trunk. I haven't touched it."
Red-clothed Little Brother said: "You deserved it, I'm telling you."
Blue-clothed Little Brother said: "You are such a waste, always upsetting Big Brother, you look like a joke. How are we ever going to make it out here?"

Wang Xiaobing took the box and carefully examined it. Blue-clothed Little Brother and Red-clothed Little Brother looked at the box with him. Wang Xiaobing asked, "My box really hasn't been touched, right?"
Yellow-clothed Little Brother said: "Then you should just keep your mouth shut."

Big Brother said: "On behalf of our team, I extend our deepest apologies to you." After saying that, Wang Xiaobing quickly ran to the car to get the money, while Big Brother and Blue-clothed Little Brother followed.
Yellow-clothed Little Brother said: "We are all professionals. Let's leave contact information."
Big Brother said, "Add me on WeChat."
Red-clothed Little Brother got out of the car and said, "Add your Weibo, and follow you, to be your fan."
Blue-clothed Little Brother said: "You deserved it."
Blue-clothed Little Brother said: "Deserved it."

movie101_7166164445343941151_5400_5580.text: The scene shifts to a small restaurant by the roadside. Driver is on the phone promising a friend that he will be there soon, then hangs up. He glances at his watch and continues on his way.
Driver, who was originally driving with a smile, immediately became serious after hearing the news. He put down the phone and tightly gripped the steering wheel, driving defensively on the highway.

The car sped along the road, but suddenly, the rear wheels lost traction and the car wobbled to the side of the road. Driver, realizing what had happened, stepped on the gas and spun the steering wheel hard to the right.

The scene shifts to a bridge, where a truck is driving with a man sitting in the driver's seat, chewing gum. The truck has a tarpaulin covering its cargo area, which is secured with a few steel cables. The truck's body is mostly white, with some colorful patterns and text near the bottom.
The scene shifts to the highway, where the car carrying the two men is driving along.
Driver turns around and says: "Brother, the box has been found, brother."
He stood on the overpass and looked back, only to see the car gradually moving away.
He looked at his watch, then at the road, and finally took out his mobile phone from his pocket. He hesitated for a moment, then pressed the call button and put it to his ear, saying, "Hello?"

The scene shifts, and Driver is on the phone. A woman's voice comes through the phone, "Driver, come back quickly. Someone has paid for our daughter's surgery, and the operation will be done tomorrow morning."
Driver said anxiously: "Let, let, let, let, let that person who paid, wait for me urgently, I'll be back immediately."
The person on the other end said, "I don't know who paid, but Dr. Zhang said someone asked him to pass a letter to you."
Driver says, "What? Quickly ask him to read the letter to me."
Driver said: "Hold on, let me read it to you."
Driver says, "Hurry up and read it."

Driver said: "Brother, when you see this letter, I will have temporarily lost my freedom, but my heart is free." "I have hated you for these ten years, but now I understand that I should hate myself." "There is a card in this letter with some money in it, which I have saved over the years." "Take your wife, kids, and Yang Shan back to our hometown with seven streetlights, and wait for me."

After hanging up the phone, Driver felt a bit at a loss. He sighed, put the phone back in his pocket, and continued to walk. After a few steps, he turned back to look at the direction his ex-wife had left, then turned back again.

Driver is singing in the truck, 'The wind is cold, the rain is pouring, the night is helpless, but the dream is still beautiful, inside and outside of the dream are burning hot, with your hand leading, our hearts are synchronized, you are warm, then nothing else matters.'

movie101_7166164445343941151_540_720.text: Lady Boss pointed the knife at them and said: "Don't kill anyone here!"
Middle-aged Man said: "Did you hear that?" "Yes, our rule is we can't kill anyone."
Middle-aged Man asked: "Do you submit?"
Driver says: "I submit, I submit."
Driver said: "You know why you were beaten."
Driver says: "Ah, I know, I know."
Middle-aged Man said: "If you see me again next time, I will kill you. Go." After saying this, he stared at Driver with a menacing look. Driver, with tears in his eyes, looked back at him.
Lady Boss said: "Pay up!"

The man in black, beaten and battered, cursed at the man in red, then got back into the car and drove away. The man in red, seeing the man in black drive away, immediately got into the car, started the engine, and chased after him.
Driver quickly helped the boss sit down, saying: "Brother, sit down."
Driver asked: "Where did you go?"
Driver said: "Ah, I don't know, I don't."
Man asked: "Who was that?"
Driver said: "I don't know, really."
Driver asked: "Who?"
Middle-aged Man said: "I don't know, really."
Driver asked in confusion: "Why did you hit me?"
Driver says: "I saw you nodding just now."
Driver said: "Bullshit, if I didn't nod, wouldn't I still get beaten?"
Man said: "Crazy people would rob a suitcase, huh."
Driver said: "You're still hitting me, getting used to it, huh? If you hit me again, I'll fight back!"
Man said: "A bunch of lunatics, escaping from the hospital to become gangsters!"
Driver said: "Not gangsters" "It didn't even hurt" "If you didn't fight back, nothing would happen"
Man said: "What do you want from me?"
Driver, with tears in his eyes, slowly raised his hand and said: "Borrowing money."
Man said: "Borrow money"
Man, who was lying on the ground, suddenly sat up and said: "What do you want from me?" "Didn't you harm me enough before?"
Driver said: "Looking at you, how can you hold a grudge? You still remember things that happened so many years ago. And I really didn't know you were with that woman."
Man, pointing at Driver, said: "What are you talking about, you?"
Driver said: "Alright, alright, I won't talk about it anymore."
Driver, feeling wronged, said: "It's not all my fault, everyone in the village thought," "you would marry Yang Shan," "who knew it would turn out like this?" "So, what now?"
Man said: "My passport, my plane ticket," "Everything was in that suitcase," "I need to leave within three days," "Do you understand?"

Driver said: "What a coincidence, my daughter is also sick, waiting for money for surgery in the hospital, if we don't pay within three days, it'll be dangerous, but I don't know why, the medicine has to be ordered from abroad."
Man said: "Even someone like you has a daughter."
Driver said: "Why can't I have a daughter? If you had acknowledged me earlier, I wouldn't have come here out of spite."
Man, pointing at Driver, says: "Let me tell you, if the suitcase isn't found, everything is ruined." After saying that, Man stands up and leaves.
Driver, holding the money, said: "Brother, there's really money in the suitcase, right, brother?" Driver, clutching the money, got up and walked towards the car.

movie101_7166164445343941151_720_900.text: On the other side, Wang Xiaobing was driving with his brother on the highway. The phone rang, and when he saw it was a message from Zhao Bing, he immediately opened it. The content was an invitation to go to Ji'an for a meeting. Wang Xiaobing looked at the phone and fell into deep thought.
Zhao Bing said: "I reckon the audit team will be moving into the company in about three days."
Zhao Bing asked: "Is it a large sum of money involved?"
Xu Decai replied: 'Is that something you should be asking?'
Xu Decai said: "I'm sorry, what can I do?"
Zhao Bing said: "Things are out of hand now. I told them from the beginning not to do it this way, but nobody would listen."
Zhao Bing placed his hand on Xu Decai's shoulder and asked: "Is it beyond redemption?"
Zhao Bing said: 'They want someone to take the blame. Those bastards are so ruthless.'
Zhao Bing said: "It's okay, Dé Cái. You have also been tired over these years. Go out and take a rest. As long as you are out, no one would dare do anything to you."
Xu Decai said: 'If you stay here alone, would there be any problems? Or shall we go together?'
Zhao Bing said: "If I could go, I would have gone already." "This incident came too suddenly." "If we leave now, we'll have nothing."
Xu Decai said: "Understood."
Zhao Bing said: "Then you'd better hurry and pack up. I can only hold on for three more days here. After things quieten down, I'll come and find you."
Xu Decai stood up and left, leaving Zhao Bing alone at the table. Zhao Bing called out, "Decai!"
Zhao Bing said: 'Those backups of company data at your place need to be immediately destroyed. Otherwise, if anything happens, we'll have nowhere to be buried.'
Xu Decai said: "I'll get it done."
Zhao Bing looked at the man in front of her, nodded slightly, and said: "Yeah, Huang Feng."
Xu Decai asked: "Who's that?"
Wang Xiaobing explained: "Our drivers call him the chief of the underground transportation bureau."

Wang Xiaobing said: "Driving here, why are you talking nonsense! This underground traffic chief controls no less than the surface, big truck drivers with tempered are not dare to run wild at toll stations, traffic posts, but they shiver at the sight of Huang Feng."
Wang Xiaobing said: "My daughter put it there." "Do you think it’s good-looking?" "Let me tell you, I really admire this Huang Feng!"
Xu Decai asked: "How old is she?"
Wang Xiaobing said: "He's only in his fifties, huh, with this position, the future is limitless!"
The driver said: "Bullshit."
Wang Xiaobing said: "Ah"
Xu Decai said: "I'm asking how old is your daughter?"
Wang Xiaobing said: "Vaguely, I thought you were asking about Huang Feng, my daughter is nine. She's in elementary school now, which raises a lot of questions."
The driver said: "Sell your kidney! Being a mess like you, it's not much use keeping your kidney either."
Wang Xiaobing said: "Then what?"

movie101_7166164445343941151_900_1080.text: Xu Decai said: "In, everything can be sold but not kidney, I am still fighting, planning to have a boy, no, two boys"
Xu Decai said: "Hey, hey, what are you doing? Look at you, making a mess, the car is all dirty." The car drove out of the factory, and the people outside were moving goods.

Wang Xiaobing said: "Bro, bro, hey, bro, bro, bro, see that topless man, he's been in the number for three years, he's vicious when he fights, no one here dares to mess with him, and the one next to him, the one with the head like a rooster's comb, his name is Li Hai, a martial character in Beijing Opera Troupe"
Xu Decai said: "OK, OK, did those two do it?"
Wang Xiaobing said: "Why should they kill me with a butcher knife, they are big shots."
Xu Decai asked in confusion: "How in the world did you offend them?"

Wang Xiaobing said: "This is what happened. Recently, the fare for this trip to the provincial capital increased by a thousand yuan. I didn't raise mine, but maintained the original price. I wanted to get more business."
Xu Decai said: "Aren't you asking for trouble?"
Wang Xiaobing said: "What do you mean trouble? I was making money. Brother, you better talk less."
Xu Decai asked: "What are you guys doing?"
Wang Xiaobing clasped his hands and said: "Apologize apologize apologize"
Li Hai said, "What apology?"
Xu Decai said: "We got beaten and they stole our suitcase"

Wang Xiaobing said: "Yes yes yes, let me tell you. My daughter is in the hospital. So I went ahead to ask some old friends for money. But he pretended not to know me. That made me quite angry. Then I went to eat something. While eating, a bunch of guys came over and started hitting me."
Li Hai said, "I don't want money."
Wang Xiaobing said, "hit me."
Li Hai said, "Looking for trouble, aren't you?"
Wang Xiaobing looked at the shirtless Li Hai and said, "No, no, no, I came here to apologize myself."
Li Hai said, "Okay, come with me."
Wang Xiaobing said with a smile: "Thank you, brother."
Li Hai said: "This is not an apology"
Wang Xiaobing and Xu Decai looked at each other, then turned their heads to see the mahjong table through the window. The mahjong table was brightly lit, and the players were having a great time.
Huang Dage covered his face and laughed, "Haha, haha."
Huang Dage said: "Big brother wins."
The crowd clapped and cheered, saying, "Great! Great!"
The woman said: "Hurry up and bring out the money, quickly, quickly, quickly."
Wang Xiaobing said: "I won the last round and you haven't given me my money yet"
Huang Dage said: "Big brother, I have no change."
The man in the yellow shirt said: "Three yuan, three yuan, very clear."
Huang Dage said: "Isn't it just three yuan?"
Huang Dage said: "What's wrong with you, get lost!"
Huang Dage said, "Smoke a cigarette."
Huang Dage, covering his eyes, said, 'Are you lighting a cigarette or starting a fire? Get lost!'
Huang Dage took off his coat and threw it behind him, revealing his physique. Everyone teased Huang Dage.
Huang Dage said: "Big brother."
Huang Dage said: "Oh, Huang Dage, you look even more handsome."
Huang Dage said with a smile: "Yeah, it seems like I hear some dialect."
Wang Xiaobing said: "I'll drink it."
Huang Dage said with a smile, "Yeah."
Huang Dage said: "Yes."
Huang Dage said: "Hey, old fellow"
Wang Xiaobing smiled and said: "Then it's easy with Huang Dage."
Huang Dage said: "Damn, why are you carrying a broom? What's this about?"
Wang Xiaobing asked: "Who let you guys in?"
Wang Xiaobing said: "My name is Wang Xiaobing, I'm a freight driver in this market," "I, I came to apologize."
Huang Dage laughed and said, "Haha, you take me as Lin Xiangru, don't you?"
Huang Dage laughed and said: "Well, you're much more like that."

movie101_7173948149160116773_1140_1320.text: Mu Lang said, 'Get on the horse, quickly!' Mu Lang and the others rode away in a flash.
The scene shifts to the room, where the Fourth Prince is packing up. Zhu Er hurriedly came in and said: "Marquis, you're leaving?"
Purple Marquis said: "Yes, Drunken Hero and Master Qingkong have already left. There's nothing much for us to do here. By the way, there's something I need to tell you."
Fang Baoyu said: 'Tell me.'
Purple Marquis said: "I know you have always wanted to know about your background."
Fang Baoyu said: "You’re going to tell me."

Purple Marquis said: 'Yes, but there are some details that still need to be clarified. Your mother’s name was Bai Yanzhu, the number one heroine in the martial world. She was brave and decisive, admired by many in the martial world. However, because of her personality, she didn't easily pay attention to many people. Until one day, your grandfather met an outlander hero outside Qingping Manor. His name was Huo Feiteng. It was at this time that your mother also met this outlander hero. However, your grandfather was strongly opposed to this relationship.'
Fang Baoyu asked: "What happened afterward?"
The scene shifts to the room, where the flower girls ran over and said: "How about it, did you find Da Zang?"
Another flower girl said: "As per your order, we went to the bamboo forest but hadn't reached it yet."
The flower girl said: "We saw flames reaching the sky."
Fang Baoyu said: "Upon closer inspection, it turned out that the Taoist priests of Wudang had burned down the house. There wasn’t a single shadow around."

Bai Sankong, with a hood covering his head, pulled it down in front of Mu Lang, revealing his true face. Mu Lang called out, 'Hero Bai.'
Fang Baoyu, who was lying on the ground, slowly opened his eyes and saw Zhu Er sitting beside him. He immediately stood up and took the canteen from Zhu Er's hand, drinking in big gulps.
Duchess Tuo Chen said: 'You're lucky to be alive. Had you not encountered me, you probably would've died.'
Fang Baoyu, looking around, asked: 'Where is this place?' 'What happened?'
Duchess Tuo Chen said: "We've been chased by Wang Dian, and were forced to come here."
Fang Baoyu asked: 'We?' 'Who else is here?'
Duchess Tuo Chen continued: "There's also Benyue."
Fang Baoyu said: "Benyue, Benyue, where are you, where on earth is Benyue?"
Duchess Tuo Chen said: "Don't rush, she doesn't want to see you now, but she's constantly thinking about you. She urged me to come check on you, she doesn't know how to face you."
Fang Baoyu looked at the princess's resolute face and felt a pang of guilt. He sighed and said, 'I've let her down.'
Duchess Tuo Chen asked: "By the way, how did you end up here?"
Fang Baoyu said: "I was being chased by the official soldiers, so I fled into the great desert."
Duchess Tuo Chen asked, 'Why were you being chased by the official soldiers?'
Fang Baoyu said: 'There are some things that I know you may find hard to accept, but you must believe me.'
Duchess Tuo Chen asked: "What are you trying to say?"
Fang Baoyu said: "The divine being Mulang is a fake."
Duchess Tuo Chen asked: 'What do you mean?' 'I don’t understand.'
Mu Lang asked: "Have you ever heard of the ancient city of Luoya?"
Bai Sankong said: "Young hero, you aren’t joking, right?"
Mu Lang said: 'Court affairs are never a joking matter.'
Bai Sankong stood up and said: 'Are you referring to the legendary ancient city of Luoya?'

Bai Sankong said: 'Exactly' 'The ancient city of Luoya is not a legend' 'It truly exists' 'Located in the dense forests of southern Sichuan' 'Previously, people in the martial arts world thought it was just a rumor' 'Because the court didn’t want to publicize this information' 'To avoid triggering a treasure hunt frenzy.' 'However, now Minister Yan has a different idea' 'He hopes that Hero Bai will spread this information throughout the martial arts community' 'Let them kill each other over the treasure hunt' 'When the time comes, the court can easily clean up the mess' 'There’s a second reason as well.'
Bai Sankong continued: "Secondly, once everyone knows that the ancient city of Luoya is in the south of Sichuan,"

movie101_7173948149160116773_3120_3300.text: Bai Daxia said: "In the dense forest, those who are capable in the martial world will certainly rush there. At that time, we can clean up the martial arts world completely."

Shao Xiaia said: "That's right. Acting in Southern Sichuan won't alarm the common folk either. Initially, the court intended to handle it itself, but Lord Yan thought it would be better to notify Wang Dian through Bai Daxia and then inform all the sects."
Bai Daxia replied: 'Thank you for the court's trust.'
Shao Xiaia said: "The Emperor and the court place great importance on this matter," "so we ask Bai Daxia to put in extra effort."
Bai Daxia said: "Shaoxia, what are you saying? This is entirely what we should do."

Shao Xiaia said: "Oh, by the way, Lord Yan wanted me to tell you that this is the last task the court will assign to you. Once it's done, the court will fully honor its promises to you."
Bai Daxia clasped his hands and said: 'Thank you for the Emperor's grace.'

Shao Xiaia said: "The Mulang Shenjun you know was sent by the court as an enforcer in the martial world. His purpose is to eradicate the Central Plains martial world completely. Whether they are righteous or evil factions, they want to annihilate them, making the martial world vanish forever. The real Mulang Shenjun is probably already dead."
Guniang, with a fierce expression, stared at Shaoxia and said: "I'll tell you this. I can save you or kill you."
Shao Xiaia said: "As long as we can escape the desert, I will definitely prove it to you."
The scene shifts to night, Zhuer comes to the small house where Dazaang is, and says: "Haven't slept yet?"
Zhuer asked: "What are you doing?"
Dazaang said: "I am carving a Chishop Excalibur" "I'm sorry" "I forgot you lost your memory"
Zhuer says: "You haven't given up on Master's last wish to find the sword."
Dazaang said: "I've never given up, it's just because of you that I haven't gone yet."
Zhuer, with a smile, looks at Dazaang and asks: 'So, how many small wooden swords have you carved? Besides small wooden swords, have you carved anything else?'
Dazaang replies: "I have carved other things."
Dazaang takes out a wooden sculpture resembling a woman, places it in front of Zhuer, and asks: 'Is this me?'
Dazaang replies: 'Yes.'
Zhuer, with a frown, asks: 'But why didn't you carve my facial features?'
Dazaang said: "Because I'm still contemplating whether the face should be the you before losing your memory or the current you."
Zhuer, with a face full of affection, looked at Dazaang, who was lost in the music, and called out softly: "Dazaang"
Zhuer responded: "Hmm"
Zhuer asked: "Do you like me?"
Dazaang looked at Zhuer with a smile, and Zhuer said: "It seems you don't like it."
Dazaang, after pondering for a moment, said: "I just feel it's very sudden." "Why would you ask such a question?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_3300_3480.text: Woman said, "So, is it or is it not?"

The scene shifts to a small courtyard, where a family of four is sitting around a table, and a man and a woman are standing at the door. The man said: "It's too hot, let's go inside and rest."
The scene shifts to a restaurant, where the waiter said, 'Oh, my guests, please come in.' The three of them sat down, and the waiter poured tea for them.

Duchess Tuo Chen, with a seductive smile, walked to the table and sat down. She reached out to pick up the wine cup, but Fang Baoyu stopped her, saying: "Wait, don't drink yet"
Fang Baoyu looked at Ben Yue's face and asked, "What's wrong?"
Fang Baoyu said, "Look at his boots" "they obviously belong to an imperial official" "We can't stay here for long, let's leave quickly" "You go to Fengbo Pavilion ahead" "I'll follow shortly"

The scene shifts to the dining room, where the guests are seated at the table. A waitress brings the dishes to the table, and the guests begin to eat. The man in the floral shirt takes a bite of his meat and frowns, saying: "My guest, your bun is here"

movie101_7173948149160116773_3480_3660.text: Fang Baoyu, who had just picked up a knife, was instantly knocked to the ground by a kick from the soldier. The other soldiers rushed up, and Fang Baoyu quickly got up to block them.
Fang Baoyu leaped up, delivering a flying kick that knocked the leader to the ground. The other two rushed forward, but Fang Baoyu quickly adjusted his sword technique, instantly repelling them.

Another person rushed up, and Fang Baoyu quickly adjusted his fighting stance, countering each move. Soon, the people around him were knocked to the ground, and the man in red clothes tried to escape. Fang Baoyu grabbed him by the collar and threw him out.
The scene shifts to the flashback, where Mulang Shenjun, with a cold expression, looks at Fang Baoyu and says, "Even if you kill them all, you still won't stand a chance."

The soldiers of the Feather Clan, armed with long spears, charged towards the two. Mulang Shenjun, with a stern face, looked at the spear in the soldier's hand and said, "You should recognize these weapons, shouldn't you?" The soldier, holding the spear, nodded in agreement.

The guards said: "Go, go, hurry up, move faster, get inside."

Duchess Tuo Chen, who had been running, stopped and stood in front of Mulang Shenjun, looking at him with a face full of anger.
Duchess Tuo Chen was stunned, and Mulang Shenjun turned to leave.
Duchess Tuo Chen looked at Mulang Shenjun, and Mulang Shenjun gently pushed her back.

Duchess Tuo Chen's eyes widened in shock as she stared at Mulang Shenjun. She quickly pulled back the handkerchief covering her face, only to find that Mulang Shenjun had been looking at her all along.
Duchess Tuo Chen, with tears in her eyes, looked at Mulang Shenjun and said, "Tuocheng, I never imagined I would meet you here."
Duchess Tuo Chen, with tears in her eyes, looked at Mulang Shenjun, but her hand kept shaking. She suddenly pushed Mulang Shenjun away and said, "Don't touch me, who the hell are you?"

Duchess Tuo Chen was stunned, her eyes filled with disbelief. She stared at Mulang Shenjun, her pupils trembling slightly. She slowly backed away, her steps retreating inch by inch, until she was completely stunned in place.
Ben Yue, with a flicker of her eyes, looked at the man in front of her, then bent down to pick up the box from the ground. She glanced at the man again, then opened the box.

movie101_7173948149160116773_3660_3840.text: Fang Baoyu said, "At dawn, they will kill us"

Fang Baoyu said: "And I also failed the Purple-Robed Marquis" "betrayed his expectations of me" "the person I wronged the most is you" "I promised them" "I promised them everything"
Ben Yue said: "No, I can't let you do something foolish, you can't become a lackey of the court, you can't work for the Wood Wolf God."
Fang Baoyu turned to look at Ben Yue, and at that moment, the door behind him opened, and a burly man with a scar on his face came in. The man said, 'I am your grandfather.'
The three of them walked side by side under the shade of the trees, with Huyan Dazang carrying a long sword behind him.
Shitai said, "Alright, this is where we part ways, I wish you both much fortune and long life." Shitai said this and then turned to leave.
Zhu Er said, "Shitai." Shitai turned to look at Zhu Er, then nodded with a smile.
Huyan Dazang and Zhu Er were about to leave, but Bai Sankong stopped them. Zhu Er was very angry and drew his sword at Bai Sankong. Huyan Dazang quickly stepped in to stop him.
Zhu Er shouted: "Shitai"

Huyan Dazang, with a flash of his sword, quickly dealt with the obstructing enemies. Zhu Er, seeing this, hurriedly stepped forward, but Wang Dian, with a knife to his neck, said, 'Take one more step and I'll kill her in front of you all.'
Huyan Dazang asked, "Shitai, are you alright?"
Shitai shook his head and said, "No, no."
Huyan Dazang said: "Wang Dian, what do you want?"
Wang Dian, with a knife at Shitai's neck, said, '"Kill him and I'll release this old nun.'"
Huyan Dazang said: "Zhu Er has lost her memory, the poison has been neutralized, she won't listen to you anymore."
Huyan Dazang said: "Zhu Er, have you really lost your memory? You don't remember me?"
Wang Dian laughed and said, "You can't fool me." "Quick, kill that Huyan Dazang now."

movie101_7173948149160116773_3840_4020.text: Shitai said: "Remember what I just said."
Dazaang shouted: "Don't do it Shitai", Dazaang leaped up and kicked Shitai to the ground, then joined forces with the other two to fight with Shitai.

Dazaang, with a single slash, killed the obstructing enemies. In an instant, the enemies around him fell like cut grass. Dazaang leaped into the air, kicking down a group of enemies with a single leg, then landed and continued to fight with his sword. His movements were swift and decisive, making it difficult for the enemies to get close. In moments, he killed many enemies, leaving only Wang Dian and Mulang Shenjun.
Wang Dian was furious and wanted to kill Dazaang, but Dazaang dodged Wang Dian's attack and then kicked him in the chest. Dazaang said: "Do you know you have killed a kind monk?"

Wang Dian was furious and charged at Dazaang with his sword. Dazaang dodged the attack and threw a punch that knocked Wang Dian to the ground. Zhu Er quickly went to check on Wang Dian's condition. Dazaang said to Wang Dian: "Wang Dian, you are going to die."

The two were evenly matched in their struggle, with punches and kicks landing wildly. Wang Dian, with a fierce expression, charged at Dazaang with his sword. Dazaang, with a flick of his wrist, caused the sword to whistle past his face. Wang Dian was momentarily stunned, but quickly regained his composure, slashing again. Dazaang leaped into the air, dodging the fatal strike by a hair's breadth.
Dazaang swung his sword left and right, pressing step by step. Wang Dian was caught off guard and his sword was cut in half. Dazaang said: "If the heaven doesn’t take you, I will!"
Wang Dian said: "Wait". Zhu Er, hearing the call, turned back reluctantly, but the next second, she saw the person who had been hiding in the bushes the whole time.
Dazaang said: "Zhu Er" "Zhu Er" "Please beg him to save dad please" "Please beg him" "Zhu Er"

Zhu Er said: "I remember you are my dad, I also remember how you killed grandma with a sword. Now you don't even spare Shitai, you are not human at all, you do not deserve to live. Your life, your life, will only bring more harm to others."
Wang Dian said: "Zhu Er, please beg him for mercy for the sake of our father-daughter relationship."
Zhu Er said: "You killed grandma with your own hands, what family are you talking about?"
Zhu Er, with a face full of sorrow, ran towards the woods, while Dazaang shouted from behind, "Zhu Er!"
The scene shifts to the study, where Bai Sankong pours a bowl of tea for Wang Dian.
Bai Sankong said: "I told you, if anything happens to Baoyu, I won't let you go. Your men are all mediocrity. It would be easy for me to kill you."
Mulang Shenjun said: "Bai Sankong, you've always been dedicated in your work for the court. Is it worth it to ruin your future for a mere Fang Baoyu?"
Bai Sankong said: "Baoyu is my only family, even though I have wealth and influence, and hold a high official position."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4020_4200.text: Bai Sankong said: "Even if I have wealth and power, what use is it without him? If you don't agree with me, we can part ways, and you'll be the one to regret it."

Zhu Er, who had been busy tidying up the house, heard Huyan Dazang's words, put down the clothes in hand, and walked towards him. She sat opposite Huyan Dazang and said: "Do you blame me for regaining my memory long ago but never telling you?"
Huyan Dazang said: "I knew it a long time ago; I just didn't say it."
Zhu Er said: "You knew?"
Huyan Dazang said: "That night in the grass hut, your words and actions already gave it away."
Zhu Er asked: "Then why didn't you expose me?"

Huyan Dazang said: "Because during this period, these have been the happiest days since we fell in love. I stayed away from the tumultuous life of the martial world and led a carefree life of planting and tending crops. I didn't want to ruin this harmony."
Zhu Er said: "I also cherish everything here." "But it's all over now."
Huyan Dazang said: "I've made up my mind." "I want to find the Nine Treasured Swords as soon as possible to fulfill my master's wish and leave the martial world."
Zhu Er said: "But finding all nine treasured swords is bound to be extremely difficult."
Huyan Dazang said: "I know." "Recently, I've heard of a place in southern Sichuan called Jiange that has the remaining six swords." "I wonder if you would come with me."
Zhu Er said: "From now on, no matter where you go, I will never leave you. Even if it's a dragon's den or a tiger's lair, I will accompany you through it."

Huyan Dazang, with a smile, looked at Mulang Shenjun, and Fang Baoyu, who was standing by, also smiled. Mulang Shenjun, however, kept his head down and remained silent. Fang Baoyu took a step forward and said, "I came to see you to ask you to release Ben Yue."
Mulang Shenjun said: "Alright, I assume your grandfather already told you that if you want to see Ben Yue, you must bring the heads of Ziyi Hou and Baishui Shengmu in exchange."
Fang Baoyu said: "Don't even think about it."
Huyan Dazang:"Do you have any other choice?" Huyan Dazang's words pierced Fang Baoyu's heart like an arrow.
Zhu Er was shocked to see the scene before him. He saw a man with a long saber fighting with a group of people. Zhu Er said: "Isn't that Eight-Armed Divine Ape Li Ziyuan? Why is he here?"

Huyan Dazang said: "I'll take advantage of the chaos to capture him and ask." Huyan Dazang hid in the dark, waiting for an opportunity. The fight broke out, and the two sides started to clash. The masked man was watching the situation in the battlefield, looking for the right moment.
Fang Baoyu drew his sword and said: "Tell me, where is Wang Dian? Don't try any tricks."

Zhu Er: "Fang Baoyu"

At this moment, a commotion was heard from the main hall. The three of them immediately stood up and ran out. Fang Baoyu arrived in time to see the young man who had been hiding in the courtyard, but he was already lying on the ground, motionless.

The scene shifts to the military camp, where a large number of soldiers are standing in formation. In the center, there is a woman hanging from a tree, with a large knife stuck in the ground in front of her. At the foot of the tree, there is a table set for four, with wine and cups.
The scene shifts to the execution ground, where Ben Yue is tied to a cross with ropes, her hands bound above her head, and her feet resting on the ground.
Ben Yue said: "Fang Baoyu, don't come over!" "Don't come over, Baoyu!"

Huyan Dazang, with a fierce look, charged at Bai Sankong with the long sword. Bai Sankong, with a flip, landed on the ground and kicked up a cloud of dust, knocking Huyan Dazang to the ground. Huyan Dazang quickly got up and slashed at Bai Sankong with the long sword.
The two engaged in close combat, with the sound of blades clashing in the air, Huyan Dazang's agile moves were mostly seen through by Bai Sankong.
The two were quickly defeated by the encircling soldiers, collapsing in the middle of the formation. The old man and the three women watched with concern, not knowing who would win.

Zhu Er said, "I didn't mean for you to kill him! That's not what I meant! How am I supposed to explain this to others?" Zhu Er tried to stop him, but Huyan Dacang brushed her off and walked away.

Servant clasped his hands together and said: "I hope the Lord will grant this wish."

Fang Baoyu said, "Hurry and bow to your master." The two hurriedly bowed, and the scene shifted to the forest, where Zhu Er was fanning Huyan Dacang.

Zhu Er asked, "What are you planning to do?"

Zhu Er said: "Surely you have friends who are worried about you."
Huyan Dacang said: "Friend?" "Speaking of friends, you're the only one."
Zhu Er stood up and said, "I won't let you leave."

The scene shifts to the room where Brother Wang says, "My Lord, I presume you are already aware of my request."
Purple Marquis said: "I'm sorry, Brother Wang, I no longer concern myself with the matters of the martial world."

Brother Wang said: "But this concerns the honor and disgrace of the martial arts world in the Central Plains." "The one renowned as the best swordfighter, Purple Marquis," "isn't willing to fight for the justice of the martial world?"

Brother Wang said: "I would like to show the Marquis something, please."
Brother Wang said: "Please, Marquis, come out of retirement."

Fang Baoyu and Mu Lang fought evenly for a while, but Fang Baoyu gradually got the upper hand, forcing Mu Lang to retreat repeatedly.
