Before they could rejoice, dozens of guards charged at them. The two leaped up, using the long sword as a springboard, and landed amidst the high-reaching soldiers.

Seeing this, the two leaped into the air, kicking down the soldiers who were about to seize the dragon mace. The soldiers were knocked to the ground, and the crowd surged forward, shouting and charging at the two in the air.
The guards, who were originally holding long shields, were now barehanded, showing their fierce fighting spirit.

Yan Zhu's martial arts skills were solid, and her moves were powerful and swift. In a short while, she felled many soldiers. Seeing this, the Imperial Guards became anxious and started to attack her. Ben Yue was worried, but there was nothing she could do.
Bai Sankong, with a wave of his sleeve, repels the soldiers with his divine powers.
Yan Zhu, seeing the situation was dire, leaped into the air, delivering a flying kick that knocked the approaching soldier to the ground.
Purple Marquis rushed over and said, "Yan Zhu, Yan Zhu, are you alright?"

Seeing the situation was dire, Mu Lang leaped up, knocking the two soldiers into the air. He then used his internal force to knock them down. The soldiers were no match for Mu Lang and were easily defeated.

The flower girl, Ben Yue, and her companion, Yan Zhu, were fleeing everywhere when they were intercepted by a group of soldiers. The flower girl, Ben Yue, was about to escape when she was surrounded by a group of soldiers. The flower girl, Ben Yue, said, "Kill them quickly."
The children were fleeing in all directions, and the soldiers were chasing them. Suddenly, a woman in green clothes leaped onto the roof and shouted, "Stop!"

Duchess Tuo Chen, who had been waiting in the courtyard for a long time, saw the approaching Mu Lang and slowly stood up. Mu Lang also looked back at her, and their eyes met. The two shared a smile, and then Mu Lang walked straight in front of her.
The two rushed to the stable, only to find Yan Zhu injured and lying on the ground. Purple Marquis said, "Yan Zhu!"

movie101_7173948149160116773_4560_4740.text: Yan Zhu said, "Yan Zhu."
Yan Zhu said: "Purple Marquis, am I about to die? I really didn't expect my father to still be alive."
Purple Marquis said, "You will be fine, trust me, you will be fine."
Yan Zhu, who had been awakened by the noise, was still in a daze when a man's voice came from outside the door. The man said, "Yan Zhu, is it really you?"
Purple Marquis said: "Do not come any closer."
Bai Sankong said, "She is really my daughter."
Bai Sankong said: "What are you doing here? So the Swordsman of Qingping is indeed not dead. What do you want?"
Bai Sankong said, "I am here to find my daughter." "I want to talk to her alone."
Bai Sankong said: "Purple Marquis, please step out for a moment." Bai Sankong asked the two to leave the room, then squatted down to help Yan Zhu untie the ropes that bound her.

Bai Sankong said: "Yan Zhu, why? Why would you rather hide your identity and live as the Great Demon Whitewater Saintess of the martial world, than reunite with your family? Than acknowledge me? Does it mean you can even abandon your son? Why is that?"

Yan Zhu said, "Why?" "Don't you know why?" "When I was at my wit's end, Whitewater Saintess saved me." "I know she is denounced by everyone as a demoness." "But she treated me as her own child. And you?" "You used despicable means" "to separate me from Huo Feiteng, the love of my life, and let him die tragically outside the pass." "Was what you did meaningful? Was it meaningful?"
Bai Sankong said: "If you still recognize me as your father, then you should recognize Fang Baoyu too."
Yan Zhu, with tears in her eyes, looked at Bai Sankong. Bai Sankong, with a trembling voice, said, "What did you say?" "You are my mother?"
Yan Zhu said: "I am Fang Baoyu."
Fang Baoyu asked in shock, "Purple Marquis, is this true?"

Fang Baoyu said: "Yes, she is your mother. I wanted to tell you earlier, but there was never a good opportunity. Now that the enemies are at the gates, if I don't tell you now, there may never be another chance. This is also your grandfather's wish."
Fang Baoyu said: "No, it can't be. It absolutely can't be."
Yan Zhu said: "Fang Baoyu, no, Fang Baoyu."
Yan Zhu said: "Calm down."
Da Zang said: "Now that your family is reunited, I congratulate you all."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4740_4920.text: Purple Marquis said: "Da Zang, this matter also concerns you. Please don't leave yet."
Da Zang said: "I am from Penglai, this family matter has nothing to do with me."
Yan Zhu said: "That swordsman Huo Feiteng died under your master's sword."
Da Zang asked: "What evidence do you have?"

Yan Zhu said: "Have you forgotten I once inquired about your background? You even told me. You said your master is Gongsun Liang of the Northern Penglai Celestial Sect. Your father and your master both prized their swords. Your father entrusted you to your master on his deathbed, correct?"
Da Zang said: "Yes, my master told me everything. He said he met my father in the Central Plains."
Yan Zhu asked: "You said the jade pendant you carry is the only thing your father left you, right?"

Yan Zhu said: "The jade pendant is Huo Feiteng's family heirloom. You've always treated it as a talisman. Back in the day, he gave it to me as a token of affection, and I gave it to you on the day you turned one month old. The eagle tattoo on your back is exactly the same as Feiteng’s. I don't know how your master took you to Penglai, but I know you are the child of Feiteng and me. You are my child."
Da Zang said: "So according to you, my master is my father's killer, Baoyu is my brother, and you are my mother. Impossible, I won't believe it."
Yan Zhu, with tears in her eyes, walked up to her husband and said: "I know you love me."
Yan Zhu, with tears in her eyes, looked at the zither, then at Bai Sankong.
Bai Sankong looked at the two people in front of him, his eyes filled with a sense of helplessness and reluctance. He then plucked the strings of the zither.
Mulang Shenjun said: "Bai Sankong, you're in quite high spirits today."
Bai Sankong, sitting in the pavilion, looked at the lute in her hands and said: 'May I have the honor of hearing you play a piece today?'
Bai Sankong said: "The ancients played the zither for their own amusement, not for others. I’m just playing by myself today. However, I know you appreciate good music, sir."

movie101_7173948149160116773_4920_5100.text: Supervisor said: "I'm just here for the fun."
Bai Sankong:"However, since the Supervisor has said so, if I don't give face, it would be too disrespectful."
The scene shifts to the interior of the boat, where Bai Sankong is plucking the strings of the zither.
Supervisor, with a look of admiration, watches Bai Sankong. Bai Sankong, with a serious expression, continues to play the zither.

Supervisor, with a smile, looked at Bai Sankong, who was staring back with unwavering eyes. Bai Sankong's hands moved with lightning speed over the strings and frets, playing a piece of music that was both familiar and strange. The sound of the zither echoed through the valley, as if the very trees and mountains were listening.
Supervisor said: "Bai Sankong, using this much force, aren't you afraid of destroying this ancient Song Dynasty zither?"
Bai Sankong: "Unexpectedly, it seems even you, esteemed sir, understand zithers."

Supervisor said, 'The satin patterns on the zither face must be snake belly stripes, right? It should be from the Tang or Song Dynasty. Bai Sankong, using such a precious zither, must have a high level of mastery.'
Bai Sankong said, 'Supervisor, you truly are an expert. Come, come, let me play a tune.'
Supervisor said: "Bai Sankong, be careful, if you destroy this zither, it would be a great pity."
Bai Sankong says, 'It won't come to that.' Bai Sankong suddenly grabs Supervisor's hand and forcefully pulls it down, causing the lute to fall to the ground.
Bai Sankong, with a look of disdain, pushes the long sword away and smashes it onto the table. The sword shatters into pieces, and Bai Sankong's power is so great that the table is sent flying.
Supervisor, with his strong build, leaps onto the lookout tower, but his momentum carries him too far, and he falls off the tower.
The two people on the bridge were still fighting, Bai Sankong was about to pull out the long knife from his waist, but the other party was quicker and the knife was thrown into the lake.
Supervisor, with a cold expression, stared at Bai Sankong and slowly stood up. Bai Sankong said, 'What, Supervisor, do you want to leave?'

Bai Sankong: "Courting death." Bai Sankong raised his hand and shot an arrow, which the young man evaded by tumbling. He then leapt up, landing on the eaves, and with a spinning kick, knocked the flag from Bai Sankong's hand.
Supervisor said, 'Bai Sankong, I have already mastered the Ultimate Unyielding Technique. You can't hurt me; take your playing to the King of Hell.'

Bai Sankong's eyes were filled with anger and hatred, but his face showed a smile. He slowly got up and walked to the side of the zither, picked up the zither and threw it at the person under the stage. The person under the stage was about to dodge, but was still hit by the zither.

The two on the platform were still in the midst of their match, Bai Sankong's expression turning more serious as he stared at the lute in his hands, his face wrinkling, and his beard turning grey. Suddenly, he seemed to hear something, and his expression changed to one of surprise.

movie101_7173948149160116773_5100_5280.text: Baoyu, with a fierce glare at Mu Lang, swung his knife horizontally. Mu Lang, with a flip, dodged the attack and then, with a kick, sent Baoyu flying into a wooden pole.
Bai Sankong said, "I'm old, can't do it anymore." "Didn't expect to lose to Mu Lang."
Baoyu: "Grandpa, stop talking, just lie down and rest."
Bai Sankong said, "Baoyu, it’s all Grandpa’s fault, for doing so many wrong and bad things."
Bai Sankong: 'Can you forgive Grandpa?' Bai Sankong looked at the two of them, his eyes full of love. Bai Sankong: 'Yan Zhu, come over here.'

Yan Zhu, with tears in her eyes, looked at Bai Sankong, who was lying on the bed with blood at the corner of his mouth. She knew that Bai Sankong's death was not an accident, and she also knew that the person who had done this was right in front of her.
Yan Zhu said: "Stop talking, let the past be the past, from now on, we should live well."
Bai Sankong said, "Alright, the family will live well." Bai Sankong, with his last breath, looked at his daughter's hand and said, "My daughter."
Baoyu, with tears in his eyes, said: "My grandfather is the Minister of Rites."
Baoyu, with a loud shout, broke through the formation of the guards, and the soldiers behind him quickly came to support.

The soldiers, holding their spears, surround Mu Lang and attack him together. However, the moment the first spear is drawn, Mu Lang tosses it aside, and the other soldiers quickly follow suit, throwing their spears away.

Baoyu, who had been secretly observing from the tower, was so inspired by the scene that he leaped down from the tower and joined the martial contest. His agility was formidable, and his martial skills were equally dazzling. He was not inferior to the other six in terms of skill, and his speed was so fast that he could evade the blows of the other six.

Baoyu, who had been hiding in the woods, saw that the two were about to fight again and jumped down from the pavilion, landing behind Mu Lang. He drew his sword and aimed a fatal strike at Mu Lang, but was blocked by Mu Lang with a raised hand.
Baoyu, with his agility, was able to evade the attacks from the two, but he was also forced to retreat continuously. The two were evenly matched, and it was hard to tell who had the upper hand.

The two entangled in battle, Mu Lang was unable to extricate himself for a long time, and was forced to pull out his precious sword to extricate himself. The blade was sharp and swift, and the opponent was equally skilled, so the two were evenly matched for the time being.
Baoyu, who had been waiting for a long time, was not afraid of Huyan Dazang's martial arts skills. He walked up to the top of the bamboo tower, drew his knife, and said, "I knew you would come."

Huyan Dazang, who was originally on the ground, stepped onto the plank at the same time. The two of them stood at the top of the wooden tower, facing each other. The martial arts contest between the two was about to begin. Mu Lang said: "I won’t let you die."

movie101_7173948149160116773_5280_5460.text: Fang Baoyu said: "We're brothers", and with that, the two brothers charged towards Mu Lang. Mu Lang, seeing the two approach, raised his sword and struck down, but the two leaped into the air, kicking down the blade.
Fang Baoyu, with his unmatched agility, was able to evade the attacks from all directions.
Fang Baoyu, with his long robe and short sword, leaped into the air, kicking Da Zang onto the platform. The two engaged in a fierce battle, with the sound of swords and blades ringing out.

Fang Baoyu, with his long saber, was able to keep his opponent at a three-foot distance, making it difficult for Mu Lang to get close. Seeing this, Mu Lang switched to a short knife, trying to attack Fang Baoyu's face, but Fang Baoyu easily dodged.

Fang Baoyu, with a flick of his wrist, split the earring in two, then used the broken earring to knock Mu Lang's sword-wielding hand down from the pavilion. Following that, he leaped up, kicked Mu Lang in the chest, and then used the broken sword to knock Mu Lang's sword-wielding hand down from the pavilion.

Da Zang, with a flick of his wrist, used the knife as a flying tiger claw, sending the two men in front of him flying one after the other. The two men were sent flying by Da Zang, and then Mu Lang and Fang Baoyu stepped forward. Mu Lang and Fang Baoyu were no match for Da Zang, who sent them flying one after the other. The two men were sent flying by Da Zang, and then Mu Lang and Fang Baoyu stepped forward. Mu Lang and Fang Baoyu were no match for Da Zang, who sent them flying one after the other.

Fang Baoyu, who had been watching from the side, saw this scene and was shocked. He quickly drew his sword and leaped up, slashing at Mu Lang's back. Mu Lang, caught off guard, fell from the high platform, and the long sword was thrown to the ground.
Fang Baoyu, with a fierce glare at Mu Lang, grips his sword tightly, ready to fight at any moment.

Fang Baoyu, with his strong build, leaped onto the wooden frame, his legs pressing against the chest of the person beneath, and with a kick, he sent the person flying. The two people on the wooden frame grappled at each other, and in the struggle, the person in black was thrown off the frame by Fang Baoyu.

Fang Baoyu, with a flick of his wrist, sends the knife flying towards the bandits. The leader, seeing the knife coming, leaps up and kicks it away. Fang Baoyu quickly adjusts and kicks the bandit in the chest, sending him flying. The other three bandits see this and leap up, flipping over Fang Baoyu's head.

The three of them, having swapped horses, galloped across the drawbridge. The three guards, unable to react in time, were stabbed in the neck by the three men in black, who then leaped onto the drawbridge.

Fang Baoyu and Da Zang exchanged glances, and seeing the situation was dire, Fang Baoyu drew his sword and joined the fray. His sword was swift and accurate, and in a short while, he killed several soldiers. He then leaped up and kicked one of them off the city wall.

Fang Baoyu, seeing the situation was dire, threw his short sword to Da Zang. Da Zang caught the sword and, in a flash, threw it back, pinning Mu Lang's chest. Mu Lang, in pain, rolled down the stairs, and Da Zang leapt down, stepping on Mu Lang's chest.
Fang Baoyu, who was originally leaning on the railing, immediately straightened up and looked at Mu Lang. Seeing that Mu Lang was not backing down, Da Zang also stood up.
The female general, having lost her purpose, stood on the pavilion, looking at the bodies on the ground, her face filled with sorrow.
Fang Baoyu, with his last breath, looked at the tip of the sword, then at Mu Lang. He saw Mu Lang slowly retracting the sword, and he smiled contentedly.

Fang Baoyu, who had just put away his knife, was still staring at Mu Lang. Seeing that Mu Lang was not going to make a move, Fang Baoyu turned his gaze towards the woman. The woman, seeing Fang Baoyu looking at her, also moved towards Fang Baoyu. Mu Lang, who had been holding the knife, was now holding a short sword, and with a swift motion, he stabbed the woman.
Fang Baoyu was shocked to see the blood on the blade, and the three were equally startled to see Fang Baoyu's wound.

movie101_7173948149160116773_5460_5640.text: Duchess Tuo Chen, with a face full of resentment, looked at Mu Lang with hatred, while Mu Lang, with a face full of anger, stared back at her.
Duchess Tuo Chen, with a face full of anger, was about to draw her knife to kill Mu Lang, but was stopped by Fang Baoyu.
The two stood on an equal footing, their swords aimed at each other's vital points. After several exchanges, neither could gain the upper hand. Their blades collided, and sparks flew.
Mu Lang was furious, he wanted to teach the person a lesson but was stopped by the woman.
Duchess Tuo Chen, with tears in her eyes, held Mu Lang in her arms, while Fang Baoyu sat nearby, staring intently at the two.
Duchess Tuo Chen, with tears in her eyes, looked at the person in front of her, and Mu Lang, who had been manipulated by others, was now determined not to be deceived again.
Duchess Tuo Chen asked: "Why, why did you do this?"
Mu Lang said: "Do you trust me?" "My feelings for you are real."
Duchess Tuo Chen said: "I know, don't be afraid. I'll always be with you."
Duchess Tuo Chen, with tears in her eyes, looked at the person in front of her, and Da Zang called out: "Duchess Tuo Chen."
Fang Baoyu was stunned, and Da Zang looked at him with a mocking gaze. Seeing Fang Baoyu's stunned expression, Mu Lang turned to look at Da Zang, who was staring at her with a face full of sympathy.
Duchess Tuo Chen, with a face full of worry, watched as Mu Lang fell into a coma. She gently laid Mu Lang's head on the boat, and Fang Baoyu, who was standing nearby, said: "You still don't give up."
Da Zang said: "I cannot ignore my master's last wishes. This battle is inevitable, but I respect your Central Plains' rules— it will be to the extent."

Da Zang, with his sword in hand, looked at Fang Baoyu with a mocking gaze, then flicked the tip of his sword towards Fang Baoyu. Fang Baoyu, not to be outdone, also drew his sword and met Da Zang's attack head-on.

Da Zang, who had been kicked to the ground, was not yet defeated. He grabbed Fang Baoyu's leg and pulled hard, causing Fang Baoyu to fall to the ground. Da Zang then used the momentum to knock the sword from Fang Baoyu's hand.

The two engaged in a fierce battle, with the outcome of the fight in question. Da Zang, with a face full of ferocity, charged at Fang Baoyu, who remained calm and collected, not showing any intention of backing down.

Da Zang, with his long hair flowing, is very adept at close combat, and his attacks and retreats are unpredictable. He is not only able to avoid the opponent's sword, but also manages to strike the opponent's shoulder and waist with his palm, making the opponent stagger and retreat repeatedly.

Da Zang, with a flick of his wrist, sends the blade flying towards Fang Baoyu. Fang Baoyu, with a backhand grip, inverts the blade, using it to knock Da Zang into the air. Da Zang, spinning in mid-air, fails to dodge in time, and the blade pierces through his shoulder. Fang Baoyu, with a leap, knocks Da Zang to the ground.
The letter continued: "Da Zang, when you read this letter from your master, it means Chang Guang's sword was broken."

movie101_7173948149160116773_600_780.text: The crowd shouted: "Please, Purple Marquis, come out of hiding!"
Huyan Dazang, with a cold expression, walked slowly towards the high platform under the gaze of the crowd.
Huyan Dazang said, 'I am here for the Way of the Sword, hoping you can enlighten me.' Huyan Dazang drew his sword, and the two rushed to the deck.
Huyan Dazang and Purple Marquis fought evenly for a while, but then Huyan Dazang was kicked onto the mast by Purple Marquis.

Huyan Dazang, with a fierce glare at Purple Marquis, leaps onto the sail, kicking off the plank on the sail's edge, then takes to the air, performing a rotating kick at the mast, and finally lands steadily on the sail.
Huyan Dazang and Purple Marquis fought evenly for a while, but then Huyan Dazang found an opening and kicked at the opponent's chest.

The scene shifts to the execution ground, where Mulang Shenjun spins a flying knife with his wrist, which is caught by the princess. Mulang Shenjun then spins the knife out of the princess's hand and into the air. Mulang Shenjun catches the knife and asks, 'Are you alright?'
Mulang Shenjun said: 'I'm fine!'
Duchess Tuo Chen looked at Mulang Shenjun with a face full of disbelief, then turned and jumped off the wooden boat.
Seeing this, Huyan Dazang leaped up, stepped on the eaves, and charged at the person. His momentum was unstoppable, and the person had no time to react before being kicked off the boat.

Huyan Dazang, with a flick of his wrist, swung the long saber towards the side, and the blade slashed straight through the clothes of the person behind, cutting cleanly without damaging a single hair.
Huyan Dazang looked at the two people in the distance, then turned to look at Zhu Er. Zhu Er was staring at Huyan Dazang with wide eyes, as if he was a stranger.
Huyan Dazang, with a fierce look in his eyes, drew his sword and charged at the pirate. The sword pierced through the pirate's chest, and he fell into the water.
Zhu Er anxiously shouted: "Huyan Dazang, Huyan Dazang!"

Daozhang said: "It turns out that he wanted to use the blade of the people of Penglai to kill Purple Marquis." "Too bad the people of Penglai were so useless." "Now Purple Marquis has boarded the ship and returned to his solitary island."
The scene shifts to a prison cell, where a guard said: "No, Purple Marquis never went back to the solitary island, instead, he was quietly sent back to the Baiyun Monastery."
The scene shifts to the pavilion in the woods, where Daozhang says, 'Come on, good, let's have a drink first.'
Daozhang said: "Both of you, both of you."
Daozhang said: "My old friend here was just keeping me company in sword practice!"
Purple Marquis said: "Excellent, with Drunken Hero present, the duel between Daozhang and the Penglai person can be said to be foolproof."
Daozhang said: 'It should be more perilous than auspicious, I am afraid.'
Drunken Hero said: "What, are you going to duel with the person from Penglai?"

movie101_7173948149160116773_60_240.text: Bai Sankong, with a fierce glare at Da Zang, suddenly lunged forward, attempting to tear the knife handle from Da Zang's grasp. Da Zang, caught off guard, quickly adjusted his grip and parried the attack. Bai Sankong, now in a defensive posture, tried to pull back the knife handle, but Da Zang held on tightly. Bai Sankong asked, "What's your name?"
Bai Sankong said, "Huyan Dazang."

Da Zang's sword was once again knocked away by Bai Sankong's palm. In a flash, Bai Sankong's palm blade came down like a hammer, and Da Zang was sent flying. Bai Sankong then lifted his leg and kicked towards Da Zang's chest.

Bai Sankong, with a fierce glare at Da Zang, quickly dodged the dagger aimed at him. He then grabbed Da Zang's hand and kicked him onto the dining table. Bai Sankong asked, "What's your purpose from Penglai to our Central Plains?"
Mu Lang said, "To find the nine famous swords in the world and fulfill my master's last wish."
Bai Sankong said, "That's just a legend, it may not be true."
Da Zang said, "If the master said it exists, it exists."

Bai Sankong, with a stern face, was not to be trifled with. He knocked the long sword away with one hand and then, with a backhand strike, sent the sword flying out of Da Zang's hand. Da Zang said, "Say, will you help me find the divine sword?"
Bai Sankong said, "Unless the heavens and the earth are reversed and the sun and moon change color."
Da Zang said, "Draw your sword." Bai Sankong was momentarily stunned, then drew his long knife. Da Zang and Bai Sankong fought back and forth in the inn.

Da Zang, with a fierce expression, charged at Bai Sankong with his sword. Bai Sankong, on the other hand, calmly awaited the arrival of the enemy, his face showing no fear. As Da Zang got close, Bai Sankong knocked him to the ground with a staff. Seeing this, Da Zang was furious and charged again with his sword. Bai Sankong, using his staff, repeatedly struck at Da Zang's chest, sending him flying backward.

Bai Sankong was seen holding a long sword, leaping down from the eaves of a house, but before he could land, he was pulled back up by a chain. The bystanders looked on curiously. Bai Sankong then broke the chain and continued to pursue Da Zang.
The scene shifts to the main hall, where the five great sect leaders are kneeling in front of the Buddha statue, with Mu Lang standing solemnly beside them.
The scene shifts to the hall, where the young man says, "Grandpa, I swear, I will avenge you, I will kill Huyan Dazang no matter what."

The two engaged in close combat, and at this moment, Mu Lang's sword was pressed against the wooden pole of the pavilion. He quickly withdrew his sword and slashed at Da Zang, who leaped onto the pavilion, causing the sword to get stuck in the pole.

The two men were evenly matched in their fight, but the difference in their techniques was clear. Mu Lang's sword was swift and flowed freely, while Da Zang's sword was rigid and structured. Mu Lang said, "I don't want your sword anymore."

Mu Lang said, "But I want your knife." Mu Lang extended his hand, demanding the long knife. Da Zang looked at Mu Lang for a long time, then slowly sheathed his knife. Mu Lang took a step forward, and Da Zang drew his knife again.

Mu Lang said: "Wait a minute" "There is no one in the world against whom swords or guns are useless" "In fact, I have a unique soft armor for protection" "You can't hurt me" "I can't beat you" "So give this knife back to you"
Mu Lang said, "Then"
Mu Lang said, "You're not lying, you're a hero."
Mu Lang looked at him and said, "So you're also going to find the Marquis in purple."
The man said, "I'm looking for the man who made this sword."

Mu Lang said, "Maybe I'll have to fight him too." Mu Lang's eyes were resolute. He didn't want to fight anyone, but he wouldn't back down either. The scene shifted to the next day. Mu Lang stood on the rooftop, looking at the rising sun. Suddenly, a bullet hit the eave. Mu Lang frowned and looked down.

movie101_7173948149160116773_780_960.text: Purple Marquis said: "Yes, that's him, the one who is looking for all the famous swords in the Central Plains, Huyan Dazang."
Old Man said: "Oh, no wonder." "I think he's coming for your Red Sky Sword."
Purple Marquis said, "I have fought him before. So I want to practice the sword with Daozhang."
Zhu Er looked at the grilled fish and said: "You are still alive, why didn't you come to find me?"
Huyan Dazang said: "I thought I wouldn't survive." "Okay, eat." Zhu Er looked at the fish in front of her, feeling a sense of helplessness.
Old Man said: "Great, I hope the prince can use the unique moves of Penglai people and feed Daozhang. Daozhang must be looking forward to it."
Huyan Dazang said: "Why do you always follow me? This decisive battle is inevitable, you should leave."
Zhu Er said: "I can't believe that no one in this world is attached to me anymore. No one cares about me, no one pays attention to whether I live or die."
Huyan Dazang said: "You still have your father, he will care about you."
Zhu Er said: "Following him, I might as well join the White Water Palace and follow my grandmother, you really don't care about me, you really want to let me go."

Huyan Dazang said: "My master once told me a story about his youth. He had a deeply rooted love. One day, he went to a duel. My master killed his lover by his own hands. From then on, he had no worries and pursued swordsmanship wholeheartedly and eventually won the duel."
Zhu Er said: "Do you also want to kill me? Two days later, you will have a life-and-death duel with Red Pine Daozhang. So, you don't want me to be a stumbling block, do you?"
Huyan Dazang said: "Then why haven't you left yet?"
Zhu Er looked at him and asked: "If I don't leave, would you really kill me?"
Zhu Er was puzzled, but seeing the other's serious expression, he had no choice but to hand over his sword.
Zhu Er, with tears in her eyes, tried to stab the man in front of her with the dagger, but the man caught the knife with one hand.
Zhu Er said, "Now I am all alone. No one cares about me. I'd rather die under your sword. I don't regret it, I just hope you can remember me. I want you to tell me, if you ever liked me."

movie101_7173948149160116773_960_1140.text: Zhuer said: "I don't want to die without knowing why." Zhuer looked at Da Zang with tears in her eyes, and Da Zang looked back at her with a face full of sympathy.
Da Zang's eyes were filled with tenderness and love, and Zhuer knew that he had finally made up his mind. She gazed at him with deep affection, and Da Zang reached out to touch Zhuer's face.

Zhuer was deeply moved and could not stop her tears. Da Zang looked at Zhuer with a gentle gaze, then slowly reached out to take the dagger from her hand. Zhuer handed the dagger over with both hands, and Da Zang held the dagger in his hand, looking at the blood on it.
Zhuer was shocked to see the wound on the blade, and Da Zang's expression turned grim. He quickly grabbed Zhuer's hand and pressed it against the wound.
Da Zang said: 'Stop your nonsense and give me the elixir.'
Da Zang said, 'Let me take care of you, draw a warm picture for you, and let's see when your feelings are kindled.'
Zhuer said: 'You can share your joy with me, and I can help you celebrate.'

The two of them were practicing martial arts in the wild. At this moment, Da Zang was holding a sword, and Daozhang was holding a long saber. They were sparring in the open-air platform, with the sounds of their blades constantly colliding, echoing throughout the forest.
Daozhang, with his foot on the horse's belly, swung his sword at Da Zang. Da Zang, holding the horse's reins, was forced to retreat repeatedly.
Daozhang's skills were not bad either. He spun around, delivering a kick to Da Zang's chest. Da Zang was knocked to the ground but quickly got up and continued the fight.

Daozhang's martial arts skills were no less than Da Zang's. He leaped into the air, his fists moving like shooting stars, and his footwork was as light as a dragon dancing on a cloud. His every move was powerful and explosive, making it hard for Da Zang to defend.

Daozhang's sword was originally held up high, but it was knocked down by Da Zang's sword. Daozhang was furious and his face turned grim. He quickly lunged at Da Zang, but his sword was once again knocked down by Da Zang's sword.

Daozhang was not outdone, spinning around to deliver a flying kick that sent Da Zang tumbling. Daozhang then raised his sword and chopped down, but Da Zang leaped and kicked him in the chest, causing Daozhang to spit blood and fall to the ground.

After saying this, Da Zang took out a compass and started looking around. The compass pointed in a direction, and the two walked through a small path to a clearing. Da Zang lit a bonfire and they sat down to rest.

Lu Xiao stood up, his face full of worry, and said, "There's something I can't figure out." "Tell me who dares to cross me, Che Zhen Shan, on this turf of Liu City?"

The soldier said, "The checkpoint at Dongda bridge says,""They escaped by boat last night.""They even kidnapped a hostage as a cover."

movie101_7176565114756137528_2040_2220.text: Lu Xiao watched Mo Han's retreating figure, slowly turned around, and left the barracks. The sunset cast a golden glow on the wild chrysanthemums, making them even more vibrant.

movie101_7176565114756137528_2400_2580.text: Yu Xuan said, 'I sent telegrams to the prince, but the translations were incorrect, so you must go back immediately and find the correct password.'

Mo Han, with a look of helplessness, walked up to Yu Xuan and said, "I'm going to bed."

Yu Xuan stopped and said, "Wait." Yu Xuan turned around and faced Mo Han, saying, "Take care." Yu Xuan's words were full of emotion, and Mo Han looked at her with a face full of tenderness.
Yu Xuan, with a heavy heart, looked at Mo Han, but Mo Han avoided her gaze and left without a word.

Che Linlin said, "Mr. Yang Muchen, you have been to Japan?"

"However, not every Japanese person is bad, and....' Recently, our leaders are not fully committed to resisting Japan. They believe in 'pacifying internal turmoil before dealing with external aggression.' Surely you have heard of this, Colonel."

Yang Muchen smiled and said, "Come, Miss Che Linlin, let's drink to that." Yang Muchen picked up the wine glass, Che Zhenshan watched him warily. Yang Muchen clinked glasses with Che Linlin, then downed the drink in one gulp. Che Zhenshan looked at him with some unease.
Che Zhenshan said, 'Mr. Yang Muchen knows nothing at all. They say ignorance is no sin.'
The woman said angrily, "Whether he knows or not doesn't matter. What matters is that he's a heartless Japanese lackey."

Che Zhenshan said, 'He is just conveying the will of his superiors.' 'A person cannot always control their life in this world, can't your father be the same way?' 'Che Linlin, I think that Mr. Yang Muchen is a very talented man.' 'And a favorite of Director Bai, his future is limitless.'
Che Linlin said, 'What does that have to do with me?'

The scene shifts to Che Linlin's home, where Che Zhenshan says, "Che Linlin, you're not young anymore. You can't live in the past forever. You need to think about yourself. After all, we still have to live, don't we?"

The woman stood up and said, 'If you truly care for me, you would immediately drive that Mr. Yang away for me.'

Che Linlin hesitated and said, "That..."

movie101_7176565114756137528_2760_2940.text: Lu Xiao said: 'Still the woman who has seen him.'

Group leader said: "Whether I am siding with him or doing this for Lin Lin, you should be clear in your heart. Ever since Mo Han arrived, look how happy Lin Lin has been. It’s as if we’re back to our childhood days. That’s more important than anything."

The group leader said: 'Lu Xiao, a soldier should be competing on the battlefield, not competing in jealousy. Look at yourself.'
The scene shifts to Mo Han's room, where he is drinking milk and watching the TV.

Lin Lin said: 'What’s wrong with you, not a word for so long? You must be bothered by something, you.' Mo Han didn't speak, just sat on the chair. Lin Lin continued: 'You are always so suspicious, always overthinking.'
Mo Han, who was drinking, suddenly choked on the wine and fell asleep instantly.
Mo Han said: 'Lin Lin, life is short. Who doesn’t want to fall in love passionately, who doesn’t want to spend a lifetime with the one they love?'

Mo Han continued: 'But we happen to live in such times, having today doesn’t guarantee tomorrow. We can hardly ensure our own lives, who would dare to touch love so lightly? Maybe right now, outside the window, someone is aiming a gun at me.'
Lu Xiao and Mo Han walked into the room. Lu Xiao said: 'See, what did I say, confess in front of Lin Lin. Did you go on a date with your fiancée that day or not? Speak.'
Mo Han said: 'What if I tell you no, would you believe me?' Mo Han was very arrogant, and Lu Xiao was very angry.

The officer, getting closer, said: "You’ve got quite a stiff mouth, huh? If not the fiancée, then who are you sneaking around meeting with? The Communist Party? Do you dare admit it? If you dare, I’ve got the guts to put a bullet in you, right here."
Mo Han said: 'Lu Xiao, why should I admit anything to you, what are you to decide?'
The scene shifts to the living room, where Lin Lin is sitting on the sofa. Group leader orders his subordinates: "Brothers, beat him to death for me."
The scene shifts to the room where Lin Lin was staying. Lin Lin was sitting on the sofa, and suddenly a group of soldiers rushed in. Lin Lin shouted: 'Get out.'

movie101_7176565114756137528_2940_3120.text: Lu Xiao, with a face full of anger, said: "Lin Lin, he is a man engaged to be married, what are you to him anyway?"

Lin Lin, with tears in her eyes, looked at Lu Xiao on the ground, then at the gun in her hand, and finally, she collapsed onto Lu Xiao's body, shedding a few silent tears.

In the room, Mo Han was sleeping soundly on the bed. He suddenly woke up, turned over, and found that Lin Lin's bed was already empty. He immediately got up to look around the room, but Lin Lin was nowhere to be seen.
Mo Han, who was lying next to Lin Lin, looked at her and slowly sat up. He reached out and held Lin Lin's hand, then turned and looked behind him.
Mo Han, who was sitting on the edge of the bed, turned his head to look at Lin Lin, then got up and walked to the other side.
Mo Han, who was sitting on the bed, turned around, got up, and walked to the dressing table. He picked up a stool and sat down in front of the dressing table.
Mo Han searched the sofa and found a playing card under a piece of clothing.
Mo Han, who was using the toilet, heard the noise and quickly pulled up his pants. He then opened the book he was holding and started reading it carefully.
Mo Han picked up the book and flipped through it, finding it to be a notebook left by Lin Lin. He read carefully, and his eyes widened in shock.

Lin Lin was sleeping soundly on the bed, completely unaware of what was happening. Mo Han walked over to Lin Lin's bedside, drew back the curtains, and Lin Lin slowly opened her eyes and asked, "What are you doing?"
Mo Han looked around and said: "I'm looking for clothes."
Lin Lin said: "Looking for clothes? They're in the bathroom. You were sick last night, I was exhausted."
Mo Han said: "Then I'll be going back first."
Lu Xiao dialed the phone: "Please connect me to 4321" "Please connect me to 4321 once more"
Lu Xiao, with a frown, slowly put down the phone. He had been discovered by Lin Lin, and he knew it was only a matter of time before being found out by his superiors.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3120_3300.text: Hong Zichen hung up the phone, his face showing a mix of surprise and delight.
Hong Zichen arrived at the recruitment office, saw the words 'Notice of Harbor Defense Registration' on the notice, and realized that the Japanese had begun to mobilize troops.
Hong Zichen, who had been waiting outside for a long time, was almost frozen. He quickly moved to the window to look inside.
Hong Zichen, who was eavesdropping by the pillar, heard the conversation between Man and the short soldier, stood up, and looked at Man with a smile.
Hong Zichen said: "Old Xu, I'm here."
The man said: "Hong Zichen, come on in."
Man looked at Hong Zichen with a smile and said, 'Friend, we've met before, but I remember, you weren't dressed like this at the time.'
Hong Zichen said, "You've got the wrong person."
Man said, 'Friend, don't go, let's have a chat. Friend, friend, don't leave. Hey, friend, friend, watch out, friend, hold up.'
Hong Zichen fired a shot into the sky, and the crowd instantly dispersed.
Man smiled and slowly lowered his raised hand, but Hong Zichen kept his gun pointed at Man's forehead.
Man said, "Pal, if I reveal your identity, you know what fate awaits you."
Hong Zichen, holding a gun at Man, said, 'Bro, you and I, we're cut from the same cloth.'
Man asked in confusion, "What do you mean?"
Hong Zichen said, "It's all about money in the end. I'm just doing some business with the Communists."
Man nodded and said, "Not bad"

Hong Zichen said: 'Bro, in this war between the Nationalists and Communists, who knows who will win. We profiteers shouldn’t be at odds. What's more, revealing each other's identities benefits neither of us. Let's do this instead: you don't disclose my identity, and I'll give you a sum of money. As for your identity, I'll keep quiet, but you'll need to provide me with information, and I'll pay you extra for it. How about that?'
Hong Zichen's sudden action left Man somewhat at a loss, but he still maintained composure and looked at Hong Zichen with a smile.
Man handed over the gun and said, "Here."
Man said, 'My friend, from the moment I saw you, I knew we were birds of a feather, lamentably meeting too late.'
Hong Zichen said: "Birds of a feather, indeed. So, from now on, let’s meet at the place we agreed on earlier, how's that sound?"
Man said with a smile, "No problem".
Man said: "Then you go on ahead."
Man waved and said: "See you, see you." Hong Zichen looked at the departing figure, then turned and saw a woman in a blue dress running towards him. He immediately drew his gun and chased after her.

movie101_7176565114756137528_3300_3480.text: Mo Han hurriedly ran over and said: "Che Linlin, how did you get here?"

Mo Han and Che Linlin walked side by side on the street. Mo Han looked at the wooden signboard by the street, then looked around. The two of them went upstairs to a second-floor loft. The scene shifts, and Little Eyed Man pulls Mo Han aside and says: "There is a traitor in your organization."

Lu Xiao stood up and said: 'Commander, are you really this heartless?'
Che Zhen Shan said: 'I've been lenient enough. Get out.'
Lin Lin stood up and said, 'Don't go. Let me ask you. This afternoon at three, did you go to the silk shop to rendezvous with a communist?'
Lu Xiao was about to speak, but Lin Lin interrupted him. Lin Lin said: "Fine. You don't admit it. Let me ask you, "why did you kill our informant yesterday evening?"
Che Zhen Shan said: 'You were following me?'
Lu Xiao said: 'I was following that informant. He said Yang Mohan is a communist.'
Lin Lin said: 'Lu Xiao, do you think what you did would make me fall for you? You miscalculated.'
Lu Xiao said: 'Fine, why did you kill that informant? Are you trying to protect Yang Mohan and your comrades?'
Lin Lin said: 'Simple, because he was working for the Japanese.'
Lu Xiao said: 'How can it be? Commander, I never thought it would be like this. If Linlin is not a communist, then Yang Mohan must be.'
Che Zhen Shan said: 'Get out.'
Che Zhen Shan asked Lin Lin: 'Linlin, is Mohan good to you?'
Che Zhen Shan said: 'Pretty good.'

"If there's a problem" "no one is immune" "Especially Lu Xiao" "Whether your adjutant status can revive" "depends on your performance this time"

Lu Xiao: "Yes."

movie101_7228950501038293560_600_780.text: Shui Xiu, holding a teacup, walked into the room and said, 'Yu Cheng, are you there?'

The Chubby Photographer, looking at the photos, said: 'You've taken such beautiful photos, and someone still worries about portrait rights?' The photographer asked, 'Wu Zheng, where did you shoot these beautiful pictures? Who is this woman?'

movie101_7235213933035192887_1500_1680.text: The two walked to the pavilion, and Lin Chunhu said, 'I, no, no, no, no, the turtle farming cooperative is just getting started, I have a lot of work to do.'

Zhang Baoliang said, 'Did you hide my camera?'
Zhang Xiaobao pointed at the gift and said, 'Yes, I took it.'
Zhang Xiaobao said, 'Give it back to me.'
Zhang Xiaobao said, "You did this, didn’t you?" "You used the photos in my camera." "You didn't want Brother Chunhu to become the secretary, right?"

Zhang Baoliang said, "If he becomes the secretary, our family wouldn’t have peaceful days." "Didn’t you hear him say in his campaign speech that he wants to manage the Mother River?" "Isn’t that targeting our family?" "If he does that, how will our pig farm survive?"
Zhang Xiaobao looked at the newspaper, then at Zhang Baoliang, and said, 'Just because of this, you mixed with those people from East Zhang Baoliang?" "Doing such conscience-defying things?"
Zhang Baoliang said, 'I'm doing this for survival.'

movie101_7235213933035192887_3840_4020.text: Bao Liang continued, "You know about the great pig farm in the village. Why is it leased to our family every year? They willingly give us such a good place because over the years I've been treating them well, providing them with good food and drinks, and offering fine tobacco. If you still recognize me as your father, go back to your room obediently."
Bao Liang said: "Son, you have to understand, I do this for the sake of our family. As long as we father and son are united, we can raise more pigs and make more money."
Xiao Bao slaps the table and says: "Stop it, I don't want so much money." "What I want is a clear conscience." "To be human, one must have a conscience." "Without it, we're worse than pigs."
Bao Liang said: 'Bastard! How dare you talk to me like this? It was me, your father who's worse than a pig, who raised you. Spoiled piglet, if you've got the guts, then leave!'
Bao Liang said: 'Take the camera, here.'
Bao Liang, watching Xiao Bao leave, angrily said, 'Come back! If you dare leave through that door, never come back!'
Xiao Bao, who was about to go out, heard the noise and quickly ran out of the house.
The scene shifts to Luotang Village, where Mayor Yang is having a meeting with a woman. Mayor Yang asks: "Sister, how does Lin Chunhu behave usually in the village? Is he good to people?"
Mayor Yang replies: "He's very good, especially kind to the elderly."
Mayor Yang said: 'Oh, uh, then does he have anything to do with this election?'
Xiao Bao ran over and said: "Town leader, town leader!"
Mayor Yang said: "Hey, what's the matter, young man?"
Xiao Bao said: "Town leader! I'm actually here to clarify something. Lin Chunhu didn't rig the election. The photo, it was actually... I took it, you see." Xiao Bao showed the photo to Mayor Yang.

Mayor Yang said: "Everyone, please be quiet. I've called you all here because there is a very important matter I need to announce to you all. Everyone has been very concerned about the bribery case in our village's election. Over these past few days, our township investigation team has conducted a comprehensive investigation into this matter, and now, the results are out."

Mayor Yang continued: "After verification from various aspects, Lin Chunhu has not engaged in any election bribery. Therefore, the results of our election still stand. Also, during the two recommendations and one election process, Lin Chunhu received the highest call from both party members and the masses."
Mayor Yang said: "After the decision of our superior party organization, it has been confirmed that he is the candidate for the new Village Party Branch Secretary of Teahua Village."

movie101_7235213933035192887_4020_4200.text: The audience clapped and said: "Good, really good."

Mayor Yang said: 'Good, everyone be quiet, I have a very important matter,' 'to announce to everyone,' 'after verification through public reporting,' 'one of the candidates,' 'Zhang Dong, has engaged in election bribery,' 'The bribery is very clear, and the evidence is also conclusive,' 'So our township party committee has decided to revoke his eligibility as a committee member,' 'In this term's election, he will not participate,' 'Even if elected, it would be invalid.'
The man in the floral shirt said, 'Exactly, exactly, exactly.'
Younger Brother, driving, asked, 'Big brother, where are we going?'
Younger Brother said: 'Big brother, about this,' 'I know we messed it up,' 'I didn't realize they took something,' 'and couldn't keep their mouths shut.'
Younger Brother said: 'Get out, get out'
Younger Brother said: 'Big brother.'
Younger Brother said: 'Scram.'
Younger Brother said: 'Alright alright alright, I'll scram I'll scram.' Younger Brother, who was in the passenger seat, got out of the car.
Zhang Dong said: "Close the door"
Zhang Dong said, 'I'll go check it out.'
Zhang Dong said: 'A bunch of useless people'
Younger Brother shouted: 'Big brother!' Younger Brother chased after the car, while Zhang Dong drove away with a smirk, looking back.
The scene shifts, and Zhang Dong, dressed in a suit, gets out of the car, walks around the front of the car, and opens the passenger door.

The next day, the village committee posted a notice stating that the villagers' meeting had been moved to the afternoon due to the ongoing epidemic. The village committee was unusually quiet, with only a few lanterns hanging in the alleys, as if the very breath of the village had been extinguished.

Meng Ting said: 'Now, our farmers' lives are better, but our rural domestic sewage has become an important source of water pollution. So, our village organization has decided to try using ecological treatment to deal with our village's domestic sewage.'
A woman in the audience asked, 'Hey, Xiao Liu, what is ecological treatment? We don't understand, can you explain it to us?'

Meng Ting: 'Okay, this ecological treatment refers to,' 'after collecting and settling the sewage,' 'to build constructed wetlands,' 'through the joint action of wetland plants, organic substrates, and microorganisms,' 'and through multi-layer filtration,' 'degrade pollutants,' 'purify water quality and discharge rationally,' 'this method of sewage treatment is itself quite low-carbon and environmentally friendly,' 'plus the investment cost for individual projects is low,' 'it's a purely ecological treatment approach.'
Woman in Red Clothes said: "Sewage treatment tanks, aren't those things found in cities?"
Woman in Blue Clothes said: 'Exactly, building a sewage pool at our doorstep, that would smell terrible.'
The crowd responded, 'Yeah.'
Meng Ting said: 'Everyone, take a look. This is a model of a constructed wetland from the next village. This afternoon, you can all follow me for a visit, and once you see it, you'll understand.'

movie101_7235213933035192887_420_600.text: Chun Hu said: "What is going on here"
Eldest Brother said: "Chun Hu, take a look"
Chun Hu continued reading: 'To ensure there is proof of this arrangement, we're putting this in writing as a testament.'
Second Brother said: "This is all what we agreed upon back then, written in black and white"
Old Father said: "The two of us elders, each living in a different house, if one of us falls ill in the middle of the night, no one would even know, let alone take care of us."
Second Brother said: "My old man and I want to chat and speak our minds" "But we have to do it behind their backs" "It feels like being thieves."
Old Father said: "This, both of us living separately. My legs are not good. Last night, I got up to get some water and fell. When my old wife found out," "she wanted to move in to take care of me"
Mother continued: "But Eldest Brother adamantly refused. He said if she moved in, the two brothers would no longer look after us."
Chun Hu said: "Living together is no big deal."

Eldest Brother said: "Of course not" "My dad's health is poor" "My mom just had surgery last year" "If both of them live in my house" "Food, drinks, medical expenses, all would be on me alone. How can I afford it? And he wouldn't help."
Second Brother said: "What, I don't help? Who paid the twenty thousand yuan hospital fee for mom's surgery last year?"

Chun Hu said: "Stop arguing, aren't you ashamed? This is about supporting your parents, not contracting a turtle pond. Genwang, Genxing, I initially agreed to let you join our turtle farming cooperative, but now, I need to reconsider."

Chun Hu said: "If you don't support your parents, it means you have no character. And people without character are not welcome in our cooperative. When we'll allow you to join depends on your future conduct, understood?"
Old Father said: "Chun Hu, in the future, can my old wife and I still live together?"

Chun Hu said: "Don't worry" "This agreement is not valid" "There are laws in the country" "Just because you signed an agreement to separately support each parent" "doesn't mean you only take care of your own" "If you don't look after them," "it constitutes the crime of abandonment." "Even if you take it to court," "the judge will likely side with me." "Alright," "regarding the issue of supporting parents," "don't just think about how much money you are spending."

movie101_7235213933035192887_600_780.text: Man said, "Think about the old man's wishes, take good care of the old man's health, that's settled then, the two old men will live together, as for the support payments, the two brothers will split them equally."
The next day, a calf was born.
Old Secretary and Mayor Yang greeted each other.
Mayor Yang said: "I heard your blood pressure has been a bit high recently. You really need to take care of yourself."
Mayor Yang said: "It's a minor issue, no big deal, no big deal."
Mayor Yang said: "Please, please, please, come on in."
Man in Blue Clothes said: "Please, please, I've come today, mainly to prepare for the re-election of our Camellia Village Party organization, to get a sense of things."
Man in Gray Clothes asked Mayor Yang: "Mayor Yang, are there any new policies for this year's election?"

Mayor Yang said: "This year's village Party organization election is not just the business of the Party members. We're implementing a system of two nominations and one election. Candidates are nominated by both Party members and the public. The entire village can participate."
Man in Gray Clothes said: "What if some people are away all year, working or doing business and can't come back, how can they be recommended then?"
Mayor Yang said: "Public recommendation cannot be delegated," "We will try our best to inform them," "Those who can come back should come back," "Those who can't," "will have to forgo this right"
Man in Gray Clothes said: "Alright Mayor Yang, let's sit inside."
Mayor Yang said: "Alright, alright, let's go" "Please, please, please"
Seated Woman said: "From what you're saying, my Xian Gen isn't a Party member, so he has no chance of becoming the village Party Secretary?"
Woman in Black Clothes said: "Your Xian Gen, even if he were a Party member, he still wouldn't stand a chance."
Seated Woman asked: "Why?"

Woman in Black Clothes said: "I'm not joking, hey, look here, the problem with your illegal house construction last year for the wedding, that's no small matter, so even if your Xian Gen were elected, he would be removed from office."
Seated Woman asked in confusion: "Is it that serious?"

Woman in Black Clothes said: "Of course, anyone who was released from prison less than five years ago, violated family planning policies, or didn't fulfill their duties for a long time, is disqualified."

Woman in White Clothes said: "Hey, if you count it this way, there aren't many qualified people in our village. My Fang Sheng is one. But on the other hand, our nursery business has been growing, he doesn't even have time to catch a breath. Even if he were elected, he wouldn't care."
Seated Woman said: "Oh, you're boasting"

The scene shifts to a small path in the mountains, where a man is jogging. He is wearing a red shirt and black shorts, and his figure looks a bit lonely in the vast forest. A woman's voice can be heard from afar: "Xiao Bao, hurry up"
Man in Blue Clothes said: "Alright, got it"
Seated Woman asked: "Is it heavy?"
Man in Blue Clothes said: "Not heavy"
Man in Blue Clothes said: "If it's not heavy, then move faster"
Man in Blue Clothes replied: "I'm catching up"

movie101_7235213933035192887_60_240.text: The car continued to drive on the mountain road.

The car drove along the winding mountain road, with the chirping of birds and the sound of flowing water accompanying the journey. The vehicle passed through the narrow path and arrived at the destination.
The car arrived at the village entrance of the ecological park, and the large characters 'Ecological Park' appeared on the screen.

The car slowly stopped in the middle of the road, and the people around it were very excited. They surrounded the car and shouted, "Here he comes!" "Big brother, big brother!" "Watch your step, be careful, slow down!" "Big brother, slow down!" "You're finally back big brother!" "Let's go!" "Big brother, you seem very energetic!" "Let's go, let's go!" "Watch your step!"
The scene shifts to a tea garden, where a group of elderly women are gathered around a table. One of them asks, "Who is this rich man?"
The woman said, "Oh, that’s our village chief Zhang Dong. You don’t recognize him?"
The woman explained, "She's only been married a few months." "The Village Chief spends most of his time in Jiangxi." "Of course, she wouldn't recognize him."

The woman continued, "If you talk about our village, his family has the most brothers. I remember when they were little, all five of them would gang up in a fight. Everyone was afraid of them. They are very influential now."
The woman continued, "The oldest Zhang Dong is the village chief" "He doesn’t manage the village affairs" "Spends most of his time in Jiangxi doing nursery business"
The woman continued, "The second brother, Zhang Xi, is a contractor. Remember the road repair we had in our village? It was contracted to him."
The woman continued, "The third brother, Zhang Nan, is the security director of the village. He owes so much money to the small store that he could write a book about it."
The woman continued, "The fourth brother, Zhang Bei, is the factory director of the flour mill. The fifth brother, Zhang Zhong, is a big local ruffian in the village."
The woman in the green dress said, "East, West, South, North, Central, isn't this a full mahjong hand?"
The woman continued, "Let me tell you, do you know why he came back from Jiangxi at this time?"
The woman asked, "Why?"
The woman said, "For Secretary selection."
The woman nodded and said, "Oh, that makes sense."
The next day, the sun was shining brightly, and the birds were chirping. A group of people, including Zhang Dong, were walking on a small bridge in the mountains.
The scene shifts to the entrance of the hotel, where the waiter is welcoming, saying, "Come come come." "Zhang Dong, big brother, you must be tired from this trip."
The man in the suit asked, "Anything happened in the village during the half-year I was away?"
The man in the floral shirt said, "Brother, these are the materials prepared by the brothers. Come, have a look. Sit down."
The man, holding a spoon, said, "Brother, our cousin Zhang Baoliang has now surpassed the Sapium Wood King Zhang Baotang and has become the new richest man in our village."

The man in red clothes said, "The assistant village chief Liu Mengting has organized some kind of environmental volunteer team. It seems that she has some big opinions about the water quality of the Da Xi River outside our village."
Zhang Dong said, 'Just a bunch of kids messing around.'
The man said, "Big brother."

movie101_7235213933035192887_780_960.text: Zhang Xiaobao said: "Liu Mengting, this place has a beautiful view, how about I take a photo for you?"
Zhang Xiaobao: "Good, sit here, sit, sit well, one, two, three, hmm, looks good."
Zhang Xiaobao: "Liu Mengting, didn’t you just go into town a couple of days ago? Why are you heading to the city again?"

Liu Mengting said, 'Old Lady He is almost out of medicine, Uncle Lin needs to get a senior's card, his daughter needs to apply for a birth permit, and then there's Old Lady Song, who wants me to bring a jar of pickles to her son in the city. Ah, I'm too busy to keep up.'
Zhang Xiaobao said disdainfully, "Village assistant, I think you're just a runner and jack of all trades."
Liu Mengting said: "Nonsense, what I do is all about serving our villagers, unlike you, all talk no action."
Zhang Xiaobao said, "How have I been all talk no action?"
Liu Mengting said: "You’ve been talking about organizing a beautiful countryside photography exhibition for a while now, but there's been no movement on it yet."
Zhang Xiaobao: "Who says?" "The photos are all ready, look." "Not bad, right?" "Now, my dad is helping me find a venue, as soon as the venue is secured, the exhibition will start."
Liu Mengting said: "Your dad, your dad, your dad, always bringing up your dad, when will you manage to do something on your own?"
Liu Mengting took a few steps, jumped up, and ran away laughing.
Zhang Xiaobao asked: "Liu Mengting, you’re always so busy, do you have any plans for the future?"

Liu Mengting continued: "Well, my plan is to manage our village's water environment well, make our village a national ecological demonstration village, and then, protect our village's ancient buildings, and also, to develop our village's cultural tourism resources heavily, then let people from all over the country come visit our village."
Zhang Xiaobao: "And then?"
Liu Mengting said: "And then, if I get the chance, I would like to go back to school to continue studying my major."
Zhang Xiaobao: "Still studying, huh?" "You’ll be an old maid by the time you're done, then how will you marry me?"
Liu Mengting said: "Stop it."

Zhang Xiaobao said, "Hey, Liu Mengting, actually I have my plans too. You know, my dad just bought me a car recently, right? He said he's going to buy me a house too." " Seeing as we’re both not so young anymore, shouldn’t we..."

Zhang Xiaobao: "Hey, why are you walking so slow?" "Old Lady He is waiting for us at home, let's move faster." Zhang Xiaobao and Liu Mengting walked through the tea garden and returned home. The small courtyard was empty, with only an old man sitting on a wooden chair.
Liu Mengting poured the water into the teapot, then picked up the teapot and poured the water into a bowl.

movie101_7235213933035192887_960_1140.text: Liu Mengting went to the kitchen, picked up the medicine, and said to Auntie He, "Auntie He, this is the newly bought medicine. It's more effective than the last one. You need to take it once a day. Don't forget."
Liu Mengting said, "Okay, I got it!"
Zhang Xiaobao, who was taking photos, saw Chun Hu and said with a smile, "Hey, Chun Hu bro, what a coincidence, you're here too."
Chun Hu: "Yes, Auntie He hasn't been well, so I brought a turtle I raised myself to help Auntie He regain strength."
Zhang Xiaobao: "Ah, alright."
Liu Mengting said: "Chun Hu bro, please have a seat!"
Liu Mengting said: "Alright, alright, Auntie He."
Auntie He said: "Hey"
Chun Hu said: "Look, this turtle is so fresh!" "Auntie He, are you feeling any better?"
Auntie He said: "Much better!"
Chun Hu said: "That's good to hear, it's great that you're recovering!"

Auntie He said: "Thank you, Chun Hu, you're such a good person. You never forget us old folks, even during holidays you give us red envelopes. Over the past few years, I can't even count how many turtles I've received from you."

The scene shifts to the village committee, where a notice is posted on the board: "Notice for the election of the Camellia Village Party Organization. According to the requirements of the higher-level party organization, our village will elect the next committee members of the Party Organization."
Bao Liang was so frightened that he didn't know what to do for a moment, and then laughed.
Bao Liang quickly said: "Hey, hey, hey."
Bao Liang said: "You didn't need to bring a gift when you came. Why are you being so polite?"
Bao Liang said: "Director, this is the pig face we cured ourselves at home. You can't find this kind of stuff in Jiangxi."
Bao Liang, holding a chicken, said: "Old Five."
Director said: "Oh."
Bao Liang said: "Take it to the kitchen and prepare it well. Let's have it for lunch."
Bao Liang:"Okay."
Director said: "Prepare a good bottle of wine, so I can have a drink with Bao Liang."
Bao Liang clapped and said: "Alright alright alright."
Director said: "Ah, Bao Liang."
Director said: "Hey."
Director asked, "How's business in the first half of the year?"
Bao Liang: "Not too great, business is tough these days."
Director said: "You're being humble, aren't you? You've always been the richest person in our village."
Bao Liang: "Oh, richest in the village? I'm barely scraping by. For instance, I wanted to expand my pig farm."
Director said: "That's a good thing!"

Bao Liang said: "But dealing with the land isn't easy. The two households living there refuse to move no matter what, causing a big fuss. Today, I'm hoping you, Director, can put in a good word and help my cousin out."
Director said: "Bao Liang ah."
Director said: "Oh."
Director said: "This timing isn't right."
Director said: "Ah?"
Director said: "We're in the middle of the village organization election, and since you're my cousin, if I speak up for you, people will listen."
Director said: "Those with ulterior motives will accuse me of favoritism."
Bao Liang said: "Hey, in our village, with the surname Zhang, going back three generations, aren't we all relatives? Are you really afraid of that?"
Director asked: "Do you have some sort of leverage that they're holding against you?"
Bao Liang, puzzled, asked, "Leverage? How could that be?" "My pig farm has all the proper paperwork."
